1.content:
You groan to yourself loudly as your mother and step dad drive away. Why did she marry that idiot? But at least you're going to be far away from them now. Of course, this place didn't seem to be much better. Calloway's Military School, not exactly a spa, but at least the place looked clean.

It was the school itself was a basic school building made of brown brick, with a large steel fence surrounding it. You didn't know much about military school, but movies and rumors had given you the idea you'd be spending a lot of time peeling potatoes and cleaning latrines. With a sigh your notice a comm with a large button, you press it.

"Yes, what is it?" A voice comes from the comm. You notice a nearby camera, and assume whoever was on the comm was also watching you.

"I'm your newest student." You say with no emotion in your voice, wishing for a moment you were anywhere but here.

"Name?" The voice asks. You give him your name, and for a moment you can here him shuffle through papers. "No, you're definitely not registered here."

You get a confused look and wonder if the guy had screwed up or if something if wrong with the paper work.

"We got a call about you earlier, you're not registered here, you're registered at Grimwood. It the building the right next to us up the hill, you can't miss it." The man on the other side of the comm said.

"What?" You're not registered here? How did that happen? For a moment, you're actually pretty happy, this means no Military school. But then you looked up the hill and notice the 'school'. You're not sure how you missed it before. It was a big old building, that looked decrepit, and cute spooky. That couldn't be a school, it looked more like a haunted house. You press the buzzer again, but the person on the other side of the comm is done talking.

You didn't know the area at all, and it looked like it would rain any minute. With no other options you grab your bags and start heading up the hill. Thankfully it was to long a walk, unfortunately the school looked worse up close.

Dead plant life, insects everywhere, and the building looked even scarier up close. Gather up all your courage you knock on the door, secretly hoping for no one to answer. Like most of your wishes, this one didn't come true.

A woman who appeared to be middle aged opened the door, grabbed your arm and pulled you in. You let out a yelp and nearly drop your bags.

"Oh good, you're here." The woman lets go of your arm and speaks to you. "I was wondering what was taking so long. The girls have been so excited about your arrival. Allow me to introduce myself, I am Miss Grimwood and this is my school."

After she let go, you calmed down a little, but frankly this place was even scarier on the inside then the outside. "I think there's been a mix up. I'm supposed to be going to Calloway's."

Miss Grimwood shook her head. "Oh my, no I'm afraid you're mixed up. We got your application for my school quite a while ago." She pulled the application out of her pocket and showed it to you.

Great so it because someone got the address wrong, it looks like you're being spending the year in this run down shack.

"And I am proud to welcome you, the first ever student for my school who is male and the first student who is human, to Miss Grimwood's School for Ghouls."

Your blink for a moment, not understanding what she was saying at all. Was this woman crazy? This couldn't be a real school.

"I think this experience will be educational for both you and my girls, and here's one of them now." Miss Grimwood motioned to the figure that just entered the room it was...
1.title: Welcome to Ghoul School!

You turn to look in the direction she was gesturing to see...nothing. But then you hear something like a bird flapping in the distance then something small and purple flys out of the door and threw another to fast to see what it was. "Wow what was that!?" you say as you look into the blackened doorway that the thing flew into.

"Oh dear that was Sibella one of your classmates. she must not have seen you. Oh Sibella do come back and greet our new student" Miss grimwood called out and you both looked down into the blackness.

Suddenly you hear the flapping again but its louder and not coming from the doorway. You tern to see a furry purple face right in front of yours. "AHHH!" you cry out as you jump back tripping on your own feet and landing on your butt. Looking up you see that it was a bat flapping in place screeching in a way that almost sounds like its laughing.

You can't believe this. It was bad enough that you were mistakenly enrolled in the wrong school...FOR GIRLS!, but for it to be an animal training school! If word of this gets out back home you'll never hear the end of it. You can picture your girlfriend buying you a pink dog collar.

When you bend over to get up you hear a strange noise then the sound of the bats screeching is replaced by a girls laughing. You look up to see a goth girl with purple skin and hair that looked un-brushed and reached down to her shins. She had blood red lipstick on and green eyes, wearing a black dress that reached past her feet and was cut open at the bottom in a slit up to just over her knee with one leg sticking out. she had no socks on and was wearing blood red hi heels, the sleeves on her dress seemed shredded like the ends where ripped off and on her wast was a red sash.

"Sorry about that. My name is Sibella. Its fang-tastic to meet you" she said in a proper/seductive voice as she held out her hand to help you up. "Hi, where did the bat go? you ask as you take her hand and are pulled up off the ground with inhuman strength. "I'm right heer" she replies with a broad smile showing off her teeth and a...set...of...fangs? Sibella then stretches out her arms and you hear that same strange sound as a strange light surrounded her and as it dispersed you saw that bat flapping toward you. it landed on your head and bent over too look down at your face.

If this is a zombie he passed away recently. He seems to be a human just like you.

"Like, yeah," he says. "How come you know me?"

"You've helped solve like at least a thousand mysteries by now with the rest of Mystery Inc. How come you're the gym teacher here?"

"Long story, and we don't have time for it. It's time for some volleyball, so why don't you find some of the girls so we can start a game?"

The other girls look at you a bit funny now, but it's nice to know that the loveable chicken of Mystery Inc. is the gym teacher. What now?

12.content:
"Miss Grimwood!! You said how many... Oh!"

The floating girl dropped her rolling pin and did a 180! You were astounded at the eerie blue figure's naturality of talking upside down. As your foot stepped out backwards, you felt a hand clench you to your spot. <i>"Oh well, no backing out now,"</i> you said to yourself. She shook her head off, and the splotches of flour spat you right in the face. Argh.

"Phantasma, I'd like you to meet our newest student here. Please give him a nice welcome."

"How'dye do?"

She extended her hand to shake his, but just as he stuck his out, she slipped right through it and through the floor! He could hear chuckling as she flew around the room, returning from the ceiling right side up. That girl had some sense of humor, scaring the beejeesus out of him. And yet, he had to admit, she seemed kind of funny, in the good way.

"Hi," you shyly said.

"So, who's your dad?"

"Beg your pardon?"

"Your dad? Is he the Shadow of the Moon? You have his hair, you know. Oh! Or maybe you could be the son of King Kong---!!"

"Phantasma, dear, this boy is actually a <b>human</b>."

"Hoo-man? What's a hooman? Well, that's the strangest thing I've ever heard of! Welcome, hooman!"

She giggled again, and did one of her flips. You think you're about to pass out.

"What is it you were going to say, Phantasma?"

"Oh, I was just in the kitchen, and was wondering how many cookies I should make for tonight!"

"I'd make a large number, after all, we have a new arrival to welcome in!"

"Okay!!"

And with that the girl slid away, most likely towards the kitchen again. You let out a sigh, but then she pops up behind you suddenly!

"And I'll be seeing you later, hooman!"

She gives you an intangible hug, and glides away again, humming.

"Who or what <i>was</i> she?"

"Her name is, as you heard, Phantasma. The girls call her Phanty most of the time."

"What did she mean by the whole <i>dad</i> thing?"

"Oh, all of the girls here have very well renowned fathers. For instance, Phantasma's father is the Phantom. A few of the other girls you meet also have very well known fathers, too. She merely wanted to know what kind of ghoul you were! Well, I'll have a hand take your luggage up to your new room, maybe you should explore the place, perhaps meet a few of the others."

Just as she said that, the grip on his foot released, and a floating hand waved to you, just as it picked up your baggage and headed upstairs. You were knocked flat on your back... Seems like you never get a moment's rest in this house, especially because you now...
12.title: Phantasma's in the Kitchen with Flour

As you attempt to climb up the stairs, you see a creature girl dripping in seaweed running down the stairs. She has ahead of her a little girl wrapped in bandages from head to toe. Could this place get any weirder? For someone who wasn't a big fan of monster movies, you were taking the "Ghoul School" pretty well.

The hand swooshed right by you, and you almost collapsed right over the railing! Great! You didn't need to join the ranks of the dead to remain enrolled here, did you?

At long last you pushed your way up the stairs, and saw a hallway with many rooms. It didn't help that this was a girl's dormitory, so now you had the added pressure of accidentally running into something embarassing. You were too polite to be caught like such. So, take a guess, which one is your room?
122.title: Boarding Trouble

choices: You continue out to the lawn.
A little pup runs between your legs!
Another girl has overheard you, and wants to join!
123.content:
"Howza!! You shouldn't just be laying there, yeah, you! It makes you the perfect model for roadkill!"

A very furry girl howls with laughter. Why does everyone here greet you by bursting out laughing?

"Hmm, looks like you're new. Hi, I'm Winnie, the Werewolf. Ho-oow-oww do you do?"

You jump at her moon call, and she continues to laugh. With a tough pat on the back (she's about as tall as you), Winnie gets you up off the ground. As she then goes on to shake your hand, you marvel at the strength this girl obviously has. You remain in awestruck silence, until she finally says something.

"You don't talk much, do you? Must be one of those Japanese ghouls. With the frightful black hair and all... Do you ever cut it? I can't barely see your face! I mean, even I cut my hair, from time to time."

You hadn't really thought of your hair as too long. Albeit, when your mom announced military school, you had grown your hair out severely to spite how much was going to be chopped off. If it made him look like a monster, heck, why not just keep it?

"Well..."

"Ah, he speaks!"

"Well, I like my hair long, I use it for things!"

"Yep, you must be a Japanese ghoul. Wish I could see your face though..."

She pulled aside your long black tresses, and was shocked as to what she found!

"Huh? You're a guy! Effeminate, maybe, but definitely a guy!"

You just loved how she jumped around the term "effeminate".

"Well, of course I'm a guy! I was supposed to be sent to Calloway's!"

"Oh, really? Well, aren't you glad you're over here? I mean, I am; we've never had a guy here before! And you don't have to spend your days peeling potatoes! You just have to mind a few girls... Are you man enough?"

She nudged you in the side and batted her eyes playfully. You rolled yours, and gave out a big HMPH.

"Of course I'm man enough!!"

"Good, then you'll make a good wrestling partner for me! You see, Miss Grimwood says I shouldn't practice wrestling, because it's a man's sport. But, if I have a man on my side, she'll have to let me try it! You will help me, won't you?"

"A... Aah, I..."

"Great! Thanks! You're such a friend..."

She gave you a big bear (or was it wolf?) hug, and you couldn't deny how warm it felt. Perhaps you really should become this girl's wrestling partner, even though you never had wrestled in your life.

"C'mon! I'll take you out to the lawn, and we can do a few manuevers!"

Well, what else could happen?
123.title: Winnie the Werewolf/Wrestler

choices: Hope you can leap over the moat!
Try and catch the mystery figure!
1231.content:
"Alright then, here I come!!! HOOOOOOOOOO-ya!!"

Winnie leaps at you with a vigorous lunge! You do your best to fend her off, and dip under to catch her legs. She whines, but crawls right back to pin you from behind. You send up the white flag, and she triumphantly prances around the lawn.

"I knew it would be fun! C'mon, lets go a little further out, towards the edge! You aren't scared of the woods, are ya?"

She didn't even stop to get your answer, as she already darted off into the twisting and eeriely dark trees. You couldn't help but follow her now, even though you knew those woods couldn't be safe. The forest was a zig-zag of creepy branches that snagged on everything. You finally reach the clearing with completely torn clothes, and Winnie waves at you from the other side of a large moat.

"Come on, you! The other side is the bog, and we'll never get caught there!"

You peer down the chasm in fear. What a moat!

"Oh, the sharks are always hungry! They won't eat you up, silly! Just a nibble or two..."

You shiver, and are about to buck and run. However, Winnie's smile is fading... Shouldn't you just stick it out with her? As you look behind, a mysterious shadow shifts from one tree to the next. Can you trust yourself going back now?
1231.title: A Little Fighting Never Hurt No One

12313.content:
You had never been the cunning one, but you formulate a "clever" plan.

"Hey, Winnie, there's an intruder over here! The intruder was watching us wrestle; we could get caught! Let's go catch him!"

"You're right!!"

She sprints back over the moat with ease, and chases around the trees. You join in, and the hunt begins!

"Hey you, shadow, come on out! We won't hurt you if you show yourself," you holler.

"It's not funny to hide from a werewolf, buddy," Winnie retorts!

Your eyes catch a snippet of the shadow's trail, and both of you climb up the tree.

"GOTCHA!!"

Both of you definitely have a hold on something, but what is it?
12313.title: Mystery Hunt!

choices: Tell the others to stay behind; you'll confront him alone.
Stay with the others; the shadow wants to be left alone.
123132.content:
You pull down nothing. The figure has escaped! You slide back down the tree in astonishment, and Winnie helps you back up, yet again. Something catches your eye: a shadow walking away! You run up in the heat of the moment, tackling the figure to the ground!

"I've got you, I've got you!!"

You smile with pride, but Winnie comes up chuckling at you. What have you done this time?

"What a chance meeting! The figure was none other than Mr. Shaggy!!"

Shaggy?? You turn the knocked-out head of the figure, and find it is just some average guy, in desperate need of a shave.

"Maybe you should cut that hair of yours! You can't tell a normal ol' human from a shadow! Here, I'll help ya up, Mr. Shaggy."

The lanky man scrambles to his feet thanks to Winnie's strong arm. This guy was obviously normal, and human, like you. Something about him screamed "coward", and you laughed that such a guy would be in a place like this.

"What were you doing in the woods, Shaggy?"

"Well, I was, like, lookin' for Scoob! He's been missing all day, and-- ZOINKS!!"

Shaggy leaps behind you and Winnie as he shudders to point out a strange shape; the shadow returns!! But, you're not quite sure how to approach him now...
123132.title: Mistaken Shadow

choices: You head back inside to meet up with Winnie.
On your way out of the woods, you meet another girl.
1231321.content:
You leave the others behind, with a hasty excuse. They head back inside, and you're left alone in the woods with the shadow. The shadow lingers next to the moat.

"Hey, what's the big idea, you? What business do you have here?"

The shadow points to you, and walks slowly in your direction. You hold yourself steady, and the shadow emits a sound... Or at least it's to be assumed.

"Nothing, in particular... Just a listening whisper... I won't tell a soul, kid. I won't..."

"Then why in the world are you hanging around? If you aren't a spirit attending the school, then why are you here?"

"...I like to listen, kid. Listening is the best thing you can do... Especially you, kid."

"What? Why do I--? Hey, don't change the subject! Why are you here?"

"Just keep listening, kid. You might get your answer..."

The shadowy figure runs over the moat, and disappears from sight. He must have slipped into the bog... You marvel at this mystery. Where the figure had once stood laid a white business card, reading "Whisper". You assume this is the name he never mentioned... What a weird dude.

1233.content:
"Did you say wrestling? My dad showed me a few moves once! Can I come, too?"

You're paralyzed to the spot; it's a Frankensteinian monster! Albeit, it was a girl, and she didn't look too intimidating, apart from her towering stance over you and Winnie.

"Elsa! You, too? Well, the more the merrier!! ... Oh, and this is... um, I'm not sure. He doesn't talk much, but this one's definitely a guy. You can't tell because of his hair. He says he uses it for 'things'."

"Yup, must be a Japanese ghoul. I can see it, in the hair, y'know. Good morning, Silky, my name is Elsa, Elsa Frankenteen."

"Frankenteen?"

"Yep, cuz my dad is Frankensteen, and I'm, of course, a teen! So, to differenciate, I'm Frankenteen!"

You find ludricrousity in the situation, but, nevertheless, greet the tall Frankenteen girl.

"Elsa, can you keep this under wraps? I mean, the wrestling."

"Of course! It can be our own secret society! The Grimwood Ghouls Brawling League."

"Brawling League? I like it," Winnie exclaims.

With that, she bounds out the back door, and Elsa shuffles hurriedly to follow her. At the doorway, they both motion back to you, ushering you outside...
1233.title: The Grimwood Ghouls Brawling League

13.content:
You heard a howling sound that sent a chill down your spine. It sounded like a wild animal was somewhere near by. As the howling continued it got closer and closer. You walk backwards towards the door, why did the howling sound like it was coming from inside?

Suddenly you spotted source of the sound. A small girl covered in brown fur, with sharp fangs in her mouth. In fact, this girl appeared to be a werewolf.

"I'd like you to meet one of my students, Winnie." Miss Grimwood said motioning he hands toward the small monster. "Winnie, this is the new student I told you about." Winnie nodded politely and looked towards you.

"Hey, welcome to Grimwood's, I'm sure it will be a real howl with you around." Winnie said before howling again.

Your only response is silence. What exactly is going on here? "What kind of school is this?" you managed to say.

Miss Grimwood laughed lightly at the question. "Why this is a Ghoul School of course. You're our only human student."

You decide to weigh your options.

The thought of being afraid of a girl dressed up as a werewolf made you laugh, and soon, you are laughing. Man, you must have looked like a fool! Now that you could see and think clearly, you note this"Wolf Girl" looks more girl than wolf.

"Hahaha! Good one, you really had me going for a second!" The two stare at you blankly, not quite grasping what you're saying.” I got to say, that's the best werewolf costume I ever seen!" Slowly, you take in every detail of the "Wolf Girl" Winnie,” But there's one problem with it..." you say pointing at her face.

"What?" Winnie asked defensively.

“Werewolves are suppose to be hideous beast, you’re too cute,” The wolf girl blushed; no one had ever said that to her before, she wasn’t sure if it was an insult or a complement. Miss Grimwood smiled at the scene, anyone who could make a werewolf indeed to be in this school.

“Alight now you too,” the Mistress said, “I think our new student should meet the rest of our students.” Winnie looked back to Miss Grimwood confused.

“But- fine,” Winnie spoke,” Come on! Let's go find the others!” With a quick howl, she grabbed your hand and went into a mad sprint; it took all you had just to keep up with her and not end up being draggeed down.

‘Man,’ you thought, ‘Maybe she IS a werewolf as fast as she runs!’ She rushes into the next room and…

1312.content:
You see another girl. You two are running so fast there's no chance you can stop on time. You prepare yourself too ran into her. One moment you see her surprised face and the next moment you two pass through her. You wish you had't since it feels like a cold shower.
You look at the girl with open mouth. You just went right through her. That's not possible. Besides that you notice you can see right through her. Another thing is she floats above the ground.

"Ahahahaa. You must be the new student!" She laughs. " I'm Fanthasma. But they mostly call me Fanty. What kind of ghoul are you?"

"Eh... eh..." Is all you're able to say.

They were't kidding. This really is a school for ghouls. Girl ghouls. You now know something is really wrong here.

"Oh Look! Hahaa. Thare's Sibella."

"You see a purple bat that flies over too you. For one moment you wonder if the name of the bat is Sibella but then the bat grows and get's arms and legs. For you stands a girl. Purple skin and long purple hair and she wares a long dark purple gown. You must admit she looks very pretty.

"Hello. It's fang-tastic to have you here. Always nice to see new blood"

You do a few steps back. You're afraid that's for sure. All right you could think that the werewolf girl is wearing a costume. But what about that ghost girl. You went right through her. She could be a projection but that does't make sense why when you ran through her it felt like you went under an ice cold shower. It also does't explain how a bat changed into a girl.
Now you know for sure these girl are real ghouls.

"What's wrong? Bat got your thong?"

You think what too do when you suddenly feel a hand on your shoulder. You see the has stitches at the wrist like it's stitched on. You look over your shoulder afraid of what you might see.
You see girl with black hair that's stitched together.

"Hi. Nice to meet you I'm Elsa Frankenteen."

You look at the other girls. Winnie has a grin. You can clearly see her razor sharp teeth grow out of living gums. Sibella has a grin wide enough to see two sharp fangs. Fanty is just laughing while she is floating in the air.
The next moment you ran away screaming like mad.

"I just wanted to say hello." Elsa said.

"Ah i guess he's just shy." Sibella said.

"Yeah and he's the only guy. Say has anyone seen Tannis?"

You ran through some rooms and suddenly you see a small girl. She looks pretty normal. No fangs, razor sharp teeth, claws, looking through or stitched on limbs. Just a normal little girl except she is wrapped up in bandage. Without a doubt a mummy but she look really cute whit her pink bow and blue eyes.

"Hello. Your new here right. I'm Tannis. I'm the youngest."

Friendly she sticks out her arm. You don't know what else too do then shake it. It's just a normal hand. She is't squeezing or and cracking the bones. Just a normal handshake.

"Well eh i think i must be going now." You say while you're walking too the door.

Suddenly a green lizard jumped before the door making hissing sounds.
You do one step back. The the lizard get's red and suddenly it spits fire.
Before it hits you a lasso made of bandage wraps around you and someone pulls you away just in time. It's the mummy girl Tannis.

"You're okay?"

"Yeah. Thanks Tannis."

The little mummy walks over too the dragon.

"Matches how dare you? That's a new student and Miss Grimwood told us to make sure he would feel at home here. It's very important that monsters and humans can live in harmony and this is the first step. But instead of helping you try to roast him!"

The dragon made some strange sounds.

"I don't care you don't know him. Careful or you sleep outside tonight."

"Ah there you are." Miss Grimwood says. "I know Matches does't like strangers but when you know him he's fine."

Then the other girls walk in. But the also a human and two dogs. they don't seem scared.

"Hello." The man said. "Nice to finally see another human her except for me."

It seems like this guy really is a human and is't scared from all the scary girls. Maybe the're not so bad. That mummy girl Tannis saved you. And if they were planning to kill you they could already have done it. Besides that other human also looks fine. So why would they kill you and what that Mummy girl said sounded like they wanted to have you here.
You decide to put you fear away and get to know the girls.

The wrapping's over your mouth mufflied your screams as your struggled against your bonds. But, you were wrapped out quite tightly, and as hard as you struggled, you weren't making any progress. It was like a straight-jacket.

To think, you were so close to your freedom.

Sibella placed a hand on your shoulder, with a look of remorse on her face. "Sorry about what happened back there, but I'm not always in control when I see blood."

"It's to bad, we were having some real fun there. It's gonna be great having you around." Winnie, who was courching at the side of the bed said. "Miss Grimwood you're right, things are already more exciting with him around around."

"Yes well, despite some scrapes and tumbles, I think this is going well so far." Miss Grimwood told the girls.

Yep, this woman was out of her ever loving mind.

"Meet Tanis, she was the one who treated your wounds." Miss Grimwood motioned to the small mummy girl, who waved at you in a friendly matter. Miss Grimwood then pointed to a freaky looking Frankenstien girl. "And this is Elsa." Then Miss Grimwood pointed at a ghostly girl who seemed to be floating. "And this is Phantasma."

"Haha, you're kind of strange." The ghost girl laughed madly.

"Well girls, I think it's time you unwrapped him. Your gym teacher, Shaggy, was the one who opened the door and accidentally knocked you over when you and the girls were playing. He's been pretty worried."

1323222.content:
After being told where your room is located you go to it as quickly as possible, while still making sure you didn't take another stumble. You insist to the girls you find it yourself, wanting to finally put some distance between you and them. You breath a sigh of relief when you find the room, enter, and shut the door. Then suddenly you start coughing violently due to all the dust in the air. Apparently monsters weren't great house keepers.

Sadly your room was just as dark and dank as everything else in the horrible place: The wood floor looked like it was rotting, the only furniture you had was old bed and a cabinet that had burn marks on it, but at least you had a window. Meaning, you now had a way out, and none of the Ghouls where here to stop you this time. You're on the second floor, but willing to risk a jump if it meant getting out. You open the window and scan the area below: Brown dried grass, dead or dying plants, and a small fence, nothing too threatening. You could make it this time.

You're half way out of the window when suddenly you notice something on the roof just above you. It was that freaky werewolf girl again, grinning while looking down at you. "Hey you must be feeling better, what are you doing? Is this a new game?"

You grin nervously and pull back into the room and shut the window. Nope, you weren't going anywhere. Everywhere you turn there is one of these things trying to stop you.

Wait, maybe you could call for help? You look around...but no phone in sight, but maybe there was one somewhere else in the house?

You sit on the old bed you've been provided and try and think up a plan, only then do you notice a small note on a white sheet of paper on the bed. You pick it up and read it:

'Trust no one
-Whisper'

Well, that's weird. But no more weird than anything else in this place. You don't even know a Whisper, that couldn't be a real name. You disregard the note and examine your options.

132322221221.content:
You don't open the door upon hearing the knock. You'd rather not have to talk to anyone at the moment. Considering what you've been through, you're not really sure you'll ever leave this room. But the knocking continues, and you begin the hear a voice from the other side.

"Hello?"

Yes, that voice belonged to the vampire girl, what was her name...Sibella? She nearly took a bite out of you earlier, but then again, she did heal the wound and apologize. Realizing she wasn't leaving you slowly got off the bed and opened the door.

Actually, she didn't look as scary as before. Taking a closure look, she actually was quite pretty. Her long hair hanging to her legs, smooth violet skin, and eyes that matched her skin. Frankly, in a different situation you might try hitting on her, if you weren't so afraid she'll eat you.

"Feeling better?" She asked curiously.

"Uh...sure." You reply, taking a glance around the room to see if there was anything you could defend yourself with.

Sibella brightened a little. "Good, I just wanted to really say welcome. I know you're first day here hasn't been great, but we do want you to like it here, and we really want you to stay."

You blink, well, you hadn't expected her to say that.

"Winnie saw you trying to climb out your window, she thought you were playing. Look I don't know much about mortals, but please give this a chance, I think Miss Grimwood was right about us learning from each other." She pleaded with you.

You pause for a moment, still unsure about all of this. Basically, what it came down to was you would have to spend at least a year here with monsters, ghouls, and whatever untold dangerous if you agreed. But if you didn't, who knew what the consequences could be.

Well, you didn't really have anywhere else to go. At least it would be interesting.

"I'll stay, but you'd better take it easy on me." You say, half joking, half serious.

Sibella smiles and nods. She leaves, and you decide to hit the hay, you just realized, you might need to tell someone about that strange letter. But that could wait. Despite the creepy surroundings, the howling, and the creaking, you manage to fall asleep.

You sigh heavily once again, rubbing your temples. Why, with all the people in the world, did you have to be the one to do that? One mislabeled letter and you're in a mad house.

"But I'm glad it's you. You've actually been a lot less high strung than other humans I've met. You're only tried to escape twice." She said encouragingly, and put her hand on your shoulder. Your shoulder suddenly felt cold from her touch, but you didn't try and pull away. "Thanks for talking to me, I think it's gonna be fun with you around. Talk to me if you need anything."

Winnie yawns then notions you into her room. You still upset about the situation shuffle into the room.

Winnie tell you to use the bed seeing as she has a spare.

She places the spare close to yours in case if Whisper came back.

You yawn and feeling a tad more at ease get to sleep

The next morning___________
132322221221212112211121112.title: You'd better spend the night with me, for p...

132322221221212112211122.content:
You closed the window. As odd as this all was, you're beginning to wonder if Whisper is the only one being honest with you. He hadn't tried to hurt you or anyone else, perhaps you should consider what he is telling you?

No, you weren't prepared to start accusing the ghouls of anything, but you just had to be more careful, listen more closely. Hopefully Whisper was just a weirdo...But if not you would be ready.

Exhausted beyond belief you went to your bed and slept peaceful dreamless sleep. Ready for whatever the days that followed might bring,

-

The following few daya turn out to be suprisingly average, and soon you catch on to the routine, eating, training, talking with the girls. The week pass quickly with no major incidents and no visits from Whisper, soon the weekend begins.

You join the ghouls in the common room of the school and find them already making plans.

"We should visit home today!" Sibella suggested. "It's been to long since I've seen my family."

That suggestion was positivley received by the rest of the girls, Tanis spotted you and smiled. "You wanna go with us?"

Sibella looked to Tanis. "Maybe he would like to visit his own family?"

You Shake your head, "No, that won't be happening. Heck my mom hasn't even called since I got here." You're not sure why you shared that, it wasn't something he liked to talk about and he openly told these girls. The girl look sympathetic but you look away not wanting there pity.

"Well you could still come with us." Tanis suggested.

What do you do?
132322221221212112211122.title: Tell no one once again

choices: Stay and talk to the girls' fathers'
1323222212212121122111221.content:
"Sure." Even as you speak the words you have no idea why you agreed to go with them. Perhaps the dank depressing school house was getting to you; a change of scenery would be nice. However visiting their parents seemed pretty frightening, still something inside of your mind tells you to do it, something you can't seem to fight.

"Oh goody." Tanis says with a smile, "We should all go now."

Miss Grimwood entered the room. "Everyone ready to go? Well, see you all tonight my students." Grimwood raised what looked to be a wand and suddenly the world seemed to disappear around you. A split second later and the world reappeared, but you weren't in the school anymore, but you suddenly missed the school dearly as you were now in a village that looked like something you'd see in a nightmare.

The village was filled with old decrepit buildings, rotted away by time, savage looking creatures, giant insects, snakes, and rats filled the land; skeletal remains of unknown beings littered the land. You took a step back in fear, in the process you bumped into Sibella, who didn't even notice as she was mesmerized by the landscape.

"Ah home sweet home." Sibella said, the other girls all voiced their agreement.

"Coming here was a mistake." You murmured to yourself, none of the girls seemed to hear you.

"Well, our dads will be at the Castle, we'd better go there." Winnie told the others. The Castle is only a short walk from the village, and it was a big improvement, but still looked like something of a black and white horror film. You and the others entered and once inside you noticed the large number of monsters inside. There were monsters of all shapes and sizes and they all seemed to be acting civil, like regular people. You half expected the castle full of creatures to rip you to shreds the moment you entered, but they paid little attention to you.

Staying close to the girls you follow them into a large room in the castle, inside was a large table and sitting by the table sat five monsters that were very familiar. Yes, you remembered them from the many horror films they have appeared in; Dracula, Frankenstein, the Wolfman, the Mummy and the Phantom of the Opera. As the enthusiastic girl ran to greet their fathers fear’s grip on you tightened your mind races and you look to the door.

Maybe you should take your chances with the other monsters in the castle, maybe it was better than what might happen when these horror icons realize you’re going to school with their daughters.
1323222212212121122111221.title: Go with them

13232222122121211221112211.content:
Braving the Monster World without the girls guiding you didn't seem like a good plan, besides something inside you seemed to kept telling you to meet them, like something whispering into your mind. As the girls lovingly greet their fathers you hung back not saying a word and not calling any attention to yourself, but soon enough they spot you.

"And who is this?" Dracula questioned as he looked you over. "Ah yes, the human student of the Ghoul School I've heard so much about," Dracula scratched his chin. "Very interesting."

The Phantom slammed his ghostly fists on the table. "Why is he here? Isn't bad enough we've allowed him to go to school with our girls?" He glared at you furiously.

You gulped, feeling the monster's gaze upon you.

"Daddy, we invited him." Phantasma told her father trying to calm him down.

The Mummy stood up from the table. "We have trusted him enough to let him be close to our daughters, I think we can trust him enough to see this world...Or at least see what as much as we want him to see."

The Wolfman joined the argument. "I agreed to let him to go to school with our daughters under protest! A human getting this close to monsters is risky, I fear this boy will follow an all to familiar path."

Frankenstein let out a angry groan, "Quiet! We won't talk about this anymore with our guests present."

The girls seemed as surprised by this sudden argument as you.

Dracula quiet the others and looked back at you. "Gentlemen this boy is our guest, we are being rude. Please young man, introduce yourself."

You step forward nervously, and tell them your name. The Phantom and the Wolfman both eye you suspiciously, but the other monsters seem to be at least trying to seem inviting.

"A pleasure to meet you," Dracula told you. "I trust you know all of our names?"

You nod your head.

"Splendid. our daughters speak highly of you, and we look forward with interest to how your time at school develops." He paused for a moment. "Much interest indeed. But alas I'm afraid this visit will be a short one, we have many meetings to attend today, the monster world does not run itself after all."

As the fathers say farewell to their daughters, you where overwhelmed with relief that you would be going back to your world soon, and yet a part of you seemed drawn to this world, in a way you didn't understand,
13232222122121211221112211.title: Stay and talk to the girls' fathers'

132322221221212112211122111.content:
Soon after your awkward visit to the monster world, you find yourself back at Grimwood wondering what had just happened. You walk away from the girls and walk outside the school, tired of the depressing surroundings you leave the school grounds and wander around a bit while in deep thought. Why had you decided to go to the monster world? Why had the girls fathers acted the way they did? How did you even get in this situation?

Sure an application meant for Calloway's military academy had ended up at Grimwood, but why would these monsters even consider letting you join the school?

You snapped out of your thoughts when you spotted someone else outside the school grounds. It was..
132322221221212112211122111.title: Back to your world

1323222212212121122111221111.content:
"Like hey pal," Shaggy says upon seeing you. You're relieved to see another human face after your trip, Shaggy and his dog Scooby Doo were hanging out in their van outside the school. "Want some grub man? Scoob and I are cooking up some burgers."

"Ret 'em rell rhere rot" Scooby said, cooking in a grill that will inside the truck.

You get one and gobble it up quicky, when you're surrounded by rotting monster food you really start to miss junk food. After your done eating you decide to ask Shaggy a question.

"Shaggy, why are you teaching gym at Grimwoods?" You ask him, the question had been on your mind since you got here.

"Well like when I agreed to teach her I thought it was a nice quiet school for humans, next time I'm checking out a place before I agree to work there." Shaggy said, Scooby nodded. "But I had signed a contract and, like. I didn't want to think about the penalties of breaking it man."

That made sense, Shaggy seemed pretty high strung and not the kind of person who would be here willingly.

"I thought I would never come back here after last year, but like the contract was a multi year deal, next time I read the fine print before signing anything!" Shaggy lamented shaking his head, he perked up a bit. "The girls are nice though, and the pay is good, so I guess I shouldn't complain that much. Say, like, I never thought to ask but why are you here?"

You shrugged, it was a fair question to ask. "I was going to go to the military academy, but my application ended up being sent here."

"Zoinks! Tough luck man, but why don't you just call your folks and leave?" He asks.

You sigh and go on to expalin your dad passing away and your problems with you mom and stepdad, he listens sympathetically.

"Being here beats being at home." You tell him.

"Well man, tell you what, Scooby and I will look after you while your here, we'll be like your older brothers or something, just watch our backs to." He tells you while patting you on the back.

"Reah, rothers." Scooby adds.

You crack a smile. "Yeah, I'd like that."
1323222212212121122111221111.title: Shaggy and Scooby

choices: See what the other girls are up to
13232222122121211221112211111.content:
You perk up a little after talking to Shaggy and Scooby, you're luck those two are here, they were kind of like the older brothers you always wanted but never had. You are able to push your experience in the monster world to the back of your mind after talking to them and decided to go back to the school.

You go to the common room where the girls are, the room had a tv in it but it didn't appear to be in working order, it also had books for monsters with titles such as 'Getting your fangs your whitest' and 'The finer points of fur grooming', but nothing that interested you.

You look around Tanis was setting up a board game but none of the other girls seemed to want to play, Sibella, Elsa, Phantasma and Winnie all started walking out of the room towards the kitchen, you decide to...
13232222122121211221112211111.title: Go back to the school

choices: Tell Whisper you want to know now
13232222122121211221112211112.content:
Your mood brightened after talking to Shaggy and Scooby, you decided to continue your walk enjoying getting some fresh air. You get farther and farther away from the school towards the nearby forest before deciding to turn back towards the school.

You stop dead in fright when you come face to face with someone who was standing behind you. It took you a moment to realize who it was, but it was none other than Whisper. You don't know how long he might have been following you or why he seemed so interested in the Ghoul School and you.

"Good evening my young friend." Whisper said, his face expressionless. "So I see you visited the monster world, you meet the council I assume?"

You nod your head nervously.

"Yes, they're moving quickly, but it won't save them." Whisper thought something over and looked back at you. "The time is coming for you to learn more about your part in all this, and why the freaks invited you to this school."

You want to hear what he has to say, despite the fact you don't know if you can trust him.

"But are you ready to listen? Perhaps I should wait...yes, on Halloween night I shall give you the answers and show you your real destiny."
13232222122121211221112211112.title: Whisper in the Wind

132322221221212112211122111122.content: You say nothing as you walk away casually. Your nerves seem to be getting used to the frequent pop ups and scares around this place. You walk back to Grimwood. You make your way past the common room and begin walking up the stairs. All the girls take notice and see a stern look on your face. "Gosh, I've never seen him look so serious" said Elsa. Winnie gave out a dog like whimper in concern. The other girls looked concerned as well. You quickly walk into your room and close the door. You proceed to sit in the middle of the floor Indian style with your hands open, palms up on your knees. You close your eyes and begin to slowly breath in through your nose and out through your mouth as you begin to meditate to help yourself think about what Whisper had told you. However, you don't get much time to think because there is a sudden knock on the door. You give out a heavy sigh, slightly annoyed and get up to answer the door. Who is at the door?
132322221221212112211122111122.title: What is to Come?

13232222122121211221112211112212.content:
You reach for the door knob, but before you have a chance to open it, Phanty phases through the door

with her face inches away from yours. "Hi Phanty" you say nonchalantly, being unaffected by her scare

attempt. "Awww, you're no fun" she said phasing all the way through and floating up beside you.

"Sorry to disappoint" you reply in a monotone voice. "What's wrong"? Phanty asks in concern. "You

don't seem like your usual self" she said putting a ghostly arm on your shoulder. You look down at the

transparent hand causing your shoulder to become cold. "You mean the usual self who's constantly

being scared half to death, the usual self who's constantly being fed rotten food, or perhaps the usual

self who is constantly reminded that his parents couldn't care less if he was dead”? You ask her

rhetorically. “I'm sorry” she replied removing her hand. “I was just worried is all”. She began to float

away. You breathe a heavy sigh, realizing what a jerk you just were. “Phanty” you say, causing her to

turn back around. “I-I'm sorry, I didn't mean to hurt you. I'd never intentionally hurt any of you girls. It

just feels like I've been overwhelmed lately” you continue as Phanty floats back over to you. You place

your hands on her shoulders (or put them where they would be if you could physically touch her) “I

didn't mean to take it out on you” you say smiling warmly causing her to smile as well. “Can you

forgive me”? You ask sincerely. She looks up at you and smiles. Then, unexpectedly, she lunges

forward causing you to trip and fall onto your bed. Her lips make contact with yours, causing them to

become cold. You're surprised to say the least. Phanty is kissing you! “Mmmpphhh”! You mumble

causing Phanty to snap out of it. “OH”! She exclaims. “I'm sorry. I don't know what came over me”.

You stand up to look at her eye level. “It's alright. You got swept up in the moment. It happens”. “D-did

you like it too”? She asked innocently, twiddling with her thumbs. You quickly turn away to hide your

beet red face. “Uuummm....Well-” “Dinners' ready everyone” yelled Ms. Grimwood from the kitchen.

“Come and get it”! You turn back to face Phanty rubbing the back of your head. “Yeah, I guess I kinda

did” you say smiling awkwardly. Her face lights up as she soars all over the room. “Yay! Heeheehee”!

She continued her ghostly giggling. “Well I'm going to head downstairs before Ms. Grimwood thinks

something's up”. You say walking out of the room. “Kay! See you downstairs”. She says turning back

towards you. She looks down at your cute butt and giggles. 'These girls are gonna be the death of me'

you think to yourself going downstairs for dinner.
13232222122121211221112211112212.title: A Ghostly Confession

132322221221212112211122111122121.content:
A few weeks pass without many incidents other than the occasional scare and the less than appetizing

food. Halloween is approaching and you can't seem to get what Whisper had said out of your mind.

“He's gonna tell me everything on Halloween huh”? You say to yourself as you walk around the

perimeter of the grounds. 'To think when I came here I only had a few secrets kept to myself. Now I

feel as if I have more than I count' you think, looking back at the Grimwood school. “I feel kind of bad,

but in all honesty I don't know who I can trust anymore'. You lose track of where you're walking and

unknowingly make your way towards Camp Calloway. Your thoughts are interrupted as you are greeted

unceremoniously by a group of boys a little younger than yourself. They were all wearing blue and

white uniforms and from the look of it weren't too happy to see you. “Well, well, well, look who it is

boys. It's the monster lover” one boy jeered. The others began to laugh and taunt you as well. The boys

begin to circle around you pumping their fists in a tough guy manner. This only makes you smirk.

“Look gentlemen, I have no quarrel with any of you, so why don't we just forget we even saw one

another and go about our day. This way, you won't have dirty those nice, clean pressed uniforms of

yours”. Unbeknownst to you or the boys, you were being watched from behind a thicket of brush and

bushes. A closer look would reveal that it was Winnie and Elsa looking on from the bushes, and they

did not looked pleased. “Grrrrr” growled Winnie. “Those stupid Calloway jerks, we gotta stop 'em

before they hurt him” said Elsa. Winnie's ears perked up and she sniffed the air. “Wait Elsa” she said

holding her down. Winne narrowed her eyes inspecting your facial features, breathing pattern, and

heart rate. “There are six of them and one of him, yet he's completely calm. Don't you think that's

strange”? Asked Winnie. “Now that I think about it, that is kinda weird” Elsa replied. “Let's just watch

and see what happens. If he needs our help then we'll help”. The Calloway boys continue to advance on

you slowly, pounding their fists together in an attempt to frighten you. This only causes you to smirk

once again. “Last chance boys, go home. I can guarantee if you try to fight me”. You pause for a

moment and your voice gets deeper. “It's going to end badly” you say, cracking your knuckles. “Yeah”

one of them retorts “bad for you”. “Fine then” you say. You grasp your shirt and tear it off completely,

revealing your rock hard abs and pectorals, along with your well defined biceps. “Lets go” you say

clenching your fists.
132322221221212112211122111122121.title: Contemplation and Confrontation

1323222212212121122111221111221211.content:
You take an aggressive fighting stance, ready for their attack. All of the boys take a small step back,

obviously taken aback by your appearance. “Uh, I don't know about this Tug. He looks tough” said one

boy. “What are you a bunch of babies”? The boy known as Tug rhetorically asked his companions.

“There's six of us and one of him. So quit your bellyaching” he said assertively. From behind the

bushes the girls looked on in great surprise. “Holy Howlers, what a bod”! Exclaimed Winnie. “I know,

I've never seen this side of him before” added Elsa as they both looked at the expression on your face.

You had a big grin on your face, almost as if you were excited. “What are you waiting for! I'm right

here” you say arrogantly. “You heard him” said Tug. “Get him”! He yelled. All of the cadets except for

Tug charge at you. “Heh heh” you laugh slightly amused at their ignorance. “HA”! You yell as you

charge them as well. What seems like instantaneously, you desemate the five cadets in a spectacular

display of martial arts the likes of which neither of the girls nor Tug have ever seen before. The

screams of pain from the cadets seemed to echo as you continued to land blow after agonizing blow in

a flurry of strikes and kicks at speeds that seemed to surpass even a cobra's strike. All the boys landed

in a heap one on top of the other like a stack of flapjacks as you proved they were no match for you.

You then turn to their leader Tug with a smirk on your face. The girls were speechless from their hiding

place. They merely stared, mouths agape. “That wasn't nearly as fun as I thought it would be” you say.

“I thought military cadets would give me a better challenge than this”. You begin to walk slowly over

to Tug, all the while smiling. He takes a few steps back, obviously scared of what you might do. “What

kind of military man sends his troops into battle without any kind of support” you say, lecturing him as

you continue to close in on him. “A coward, that's who” you say answering your own question. You're

only a few feet away from him now and he snaps. Like a cornered rat. He pulls out a small switch

blade. “Stay back you FREAK”! He yells holding the pocket knife in front of him to hopefully keep

you at bay. Seeing the small knife, you merely chuckle. As quick as a flash you make your move and

grab the knife. “Now that's not fair, I'm not even armed” you say sarcastically. Tug looks to his now

empty hand and back to you, realizing that you now have his knife. “AAAHHH”!!! He screams. “Y-

your a m-monster just like the rest of those freaks at Grimwood”. Says Tug. This made your sarcastic

smile disappear. It was replaced with a stern and serious look. You grab the hilt of the knife and place

your thumb at the base of the blade. “You can make fun of me. You can call me names. You can try to

hurt me. But if you DARE insult those girls again.....” You pause for a moment and flex your hand

which is holding the blade. Tug and the girls hear a loud SNAP as the blade of the knife falls to the

ground. You snapped the knife in two, using nothing but your thumb. “I will END you”! You exclaim.

“That is QUITE enough” you hear someone yell. You and Tug both turn to see the Head Master of

Camp Calloway, Colonel Calloway himself. He heard moaning and groaning and looked down to see

his cadets stacked on top of each other beaten and bruised. “What happened”! He yelled concerned. “It

was him”! Yelled Tug pointing at you. “And he was about to do the same to me” he continued. The

Colonel walked over to you. Do you have anything to say for yourself”? He asked in an angry tone.

“Yes” you say nonchalantly. You wait a few moments. “Well” he said impatiently. “You're cadets need

more training, that's for sure” you say arrogantly. “Grrrrr” He looks at you angrily gritting his teeth.......
1323222212212121122111221111221211.title: Laying the Smack Down!

13232222122121211221112211112212111.content:
Calloway immediately had the boys escorted to their camp nurse for treatment and then turned his

attention back to you. “This is unacceptable”! Exclaimed the Colonel. “I will not allow such blatant

disregard for my students safety to go unpunished”. “Like, what's with all the commotion”? Inquired

Shaggy as he and Scooby made their way to the scene. “One of your students harassed and beat my

cadets”! The Colonel shouted. “Zoinks, like, is that true”? Shaggy asked looking at you and you threw

your shirt back on. “Yes unfortunately, but only after they tried to attack me first. It was only in self

defense” you say in defense. “Oh really”? Asked the Colonel looking back towards Tug. “Is that true

Tug? Were you and the boys harassing this young man”? He asks, interrogating his cadet. “W-well uh”

said Tug nervously as he looked about. He looked back towards the Colonel to see his arms folded and

a stern look on his face. You walk over to him. Tug flinches expecting the worst, but you merely place a

hand on his shoulder. “Look” you say. “You've already made some pretty bad decisions today and your

friends paid the price for it. Don't add lying to the list. Do what's right and come clean”. Tug looks to

the ground then back to the Colonel. “Y-yes, we started it sir”. “Well, if that's the case” says Calloway

turning his attention to you. “Then I'm sorry my cadets caused you so much trouble”. You turn to him

and say “Thank yo-” “But that's no excuse for what you did” he interrupted. “Huh”? You ask confused.

“While you may have been acting in self defense, there was no reason for you to use such excessive

force”. You realize he was right. “I'm sorry sir, I guess I just let myself get carried away” you say

apologetically. “Just see to it it doesn't happen again” he said sternly. “Don't worry” said Shaggy

walking over to you, placing a hand on your shoulder. “Like, don't worry man. We'll make sure it

doesn't”. “Reah, ron't rappen ragain” added Scooby. “Good” replied the Colonel. “And as for you” he

said as he walked over to Tug. He then yanked his ear, pulling him back into camp. “Yeow, ow, ow,

ow”! Tug yelped as they went back to camp. “Like, what was all that about”? Shaggy asked. “Nothing,

just a little scuffle between boys” you reply. “Welp, whatever happened, glad it's over” he said. “Let's

go on back to the Mystery Machine, I got lunch ready and I'm starving”. “Reah, rarving” said Scooby.

“Alright” you say smiling, as you follow them. As you, Shaggy, and Scooby pass the bushes where the

girls were, there was no one there. They were already on their way back to the school to tell the others

what had happened.
13232222122121211221112211112212111.title: Apologies

132322221221212112211122111122121112.content:
Both Elsa and Winnie come busting through the front door of the school. The other girls jump in

surprise. They were in the common room talking amongst each other. “Girls! You'll never believe it”!

Exclaimed Elsa as she and Winnie made their way to the common room. “My goodness, what is it

that's got your bolts in a twist”? Asked Tannis. “It was amazing”! Interrupted Winnie. The Calloway

cadets were all like “Were gonna beat you up” and he was all like “I don't think so. Hiya, Hiya, Hiya”!

She continued as she struck several awkward looking fighting poses. Sibella, Tannis, and Phanty just

look at each other confused. “What in the world are you talking about”? Asked Sibella. At this time

Ms. Grimwood and Matches make their way through the common room to the kitchen. “Afternoon

girls, dinner will be ready in a little while”. “Thanks Ms. Grimwood” they all say in unison. Winnie

motions for the girls to move closer together and they all go into a huddle. She and Elsa go on to

explain how they saw you take on and beat the cadets without even breaking a sweat. “I'm telling you

he was spooktactular” said Winnie. “Really”? Asked Phanty. “Oh yeah, his moves were incredible. He

was so nimble and graceful”. She paused for a moment and cupped her hands under her chin as she

fantasized about the next portion of her story. “And what a bod” she said. This caught Phanty and

Sibella's full attention “His what”? Asked Sibella. “Yeah, as soon as he took his shirt off, it was like a

full moon, I couldn't look away”. “Oh brother” said Elsa, rolling her eyes. “Let's go Tannis, I think your

too young for this portion of the conversation. Tannis just looked confusedly back at the other girls as

Elsa took her out of the room. Winnie continued “His chizzled abs, bulging pecs, and his strong arms.

What a stud” she let out a heavy sigh as she began to daydream about you. “Wow” Sibella and Phanty

say in unison as they follow suit and begin to daydream about you as well. Sibella is the first to snap

out of it, realizing that she's not the only one thinking of you. “Wait a minute” she says. “Winnie, you

don't like-like him do you”? “Of course I do” Winnie replies somewhat defensively. “B-but you can't

like him. I like him” retorted Sibella. “Hey” Phanty spoke up. “You two can't like him. I like him”! She

exclaimed. “What”?! Both Winnie and Sibella say in unison. All three girls then begin to stare each

other down with a great fierceness. You could almost see the static coming from their eyes. “He's

mine”! Stated Sibella. “No way, phantoms first”! Said Phanty as a rebuttal. “You're both crazy, he

obviously likes me best”! Said Winnie. The three begin to argue amongst each other about who is most

suitable and whom among them you like best. You seem to have bad timing as you, Shaggy, Scooby,



and Scrappy all walk in and see what looks like World War Three going on. Shaggy is the first to try

and intervene. “Girls like, what's going on”? He asks. They all just turn and give him a death stare.

“Zoinks”! He exclaims. “Is it something I said”? He asked nervously. The girls then see you with them

and immediately rush over to you. “Gah”! You say as this catches you by surprise. “Which of us do you

like”? They all ask you flatly and in unison. “Huh? W-well, I like all of you girls” you say thinking you

answered correctly. (Boy were you wrong) “NO”! They say again in unison. “Which of us do you like-

like” Phanty insisted. “It's me right”? She asked striking a sexy pose. “No way, I'm the clear winner. I

AM the prettiest” said Sibella. “Yeah right” interrupted Winnie. “He obviously likes ME best”. “Well,

which is it” they say heckling you for an answer. “I uummm” you say as sweat begins to drip down

your face. You look towards Shaggy for support, only to see that he, Scrappy, and Scooby were already

gone. 'Don't leave me' you thought to yourself. “Well” the girls asked again, eager for an answer. “W-

well, you see. I um.....” “Yes”? All the girls say seductively as they cling to you. “Everyone, dinner's

ready” shouts Ms. Grimwood. “Oh would you look at that. Welp, guess we'll have to continue this

conversation some other time” you say talking a mile a minute and run as fast as you can to the kitchen,

leaving a trail of dust behind you. “Oooohhhhh” all the girls say in unison once again as they fold their

arms, obviously disappointed with your lack of an answer. You quickly take your seat at the table.

'What was that insanity about' you think to yourself as you try to clear your head.
132322221221212112211122111122121112.title: The Ladies Man

1323222212212121122111221111221211121.content:

"I've lost my appitite!"
you say sliding the bowl to the center of the table getting up walked down the hallway and up-stairs as Sibella (in bat form) flew right infront of you transforming blocking the doorway as Winnie walked upstairs and Phanty phased thru the stairs.

you ask them as they turn to you as Sibella responds

you loudly responded as they stood shock Winnie letting out a quiet whimper were they scared of you?

you respond as Sibella moves out of the way as you walk to your room.you enter sitting down at your bed hearing wood creaking on the window you walk up thinking it's the girls as Whisper pops his head out

he asked seeing your red face

you respond

you said

he replied leaving hearing a noise as the 3 girls enteredthe room
