13232222122121211221112211112212111211.title: forgivness

132322221221212112211122111122121112111.content:
You and girls break the hug. “There's just one thing I don't understand” said Winnie. “Oh”? You reply.

“What's that”? I saw your fight with the Calloway boys” she said. This made your eyes go wide. “Why

would you want to hide the fact that you're such an amazing fighter”? She asked. “Oh, you saw that

huh”? You reply. “Yeah, why would you want to keep something like that a secret”? Asked Phanty.

“Yeah, I think it's fangtastic” added Sibella. “Well” you begin to say. “My whole life.....Anyone that

has seen me fight or knew that I could fight, steered clear of me” you said as you looked down at the

floor. “Why would anyone do that”? Asked Sibella. “Everyone feared me” you say plopping on your

bed. “They were afraid of what I was capable of”. Tears began to well up in your eyes. “No one wanted

anything to do with me” you say putting your hands on your head. “To them....I was a monster, I just

didn't want you to think of me like that”. You say choking back the tears that plagued you. You are then

shocked to feel the warmth of a fuzzy hand on your shoulder. “None of us see you that way” Said

Winnie as she looked into your watery eyes. You looked towards the other girls to see their warm,

comforting, and reassuring smiles. “Yeah, we all care for you” said Sibella. “Yeah, I think your fighting

stuff is cool” added Phanty. You look back at the three of them and smile. “Thank you girls, you have

no idea how good that makes me feel” you say. They all come in for another hug and you accept their

loving embrace. 'I think I can get use to this' you think to yourself. In the darkness of the night,

Whisper watches closely from a distance, so as not to be seen. He sees the loving environment you are

in and shakes his head in disapproval. He turns and begins to walk away. 'This isn't good. I don't need

him growing attached to those freaks. This could muck up everything' he thinks to himself as he walks

further into the darkness. “By the way” said Phanty. Who taught you all that cool stuff”? “Yes, surely

had some sort of teacher” said Sibella. Winnie looked to you in interest just as the others did. “Well”

you reply looking into their eyes. “It was......my father”. “Really, wow! If you're that good, then your

dad must be GREAT”! She exclaimed. “Yeah” you say, pausing for a moment as you look up toward

the ceiling. “He was” you say coldly. “Was”? Asks Sibella. “Y-you means he's-” “Dead, yes”. You say

interrupting her. “I'm so sorry” said Phanty. “It couldn't be helped” you say. “He died doing what he

loved”. “Really? What did your dad do”? Asked Winnie. “C'mon girls, this could be a really sensitive

subject for him” says Sibella. “It's okay” you say “You girls should know”. You take in a long deep

breath, knowing that they wouldn't like the answer. “Sigh, my father.....was-” “Hey everyone”

screamed Shaggy from downstairs, interrupting you. “Like, Ms. Grimwood says it's time for bed”! He

shouted so everyone could hear. “Man! He always has bad timing” said Winnie. “I know, I wanted to

hear more” said Phanty. “Come on, you can tell us before bed” said Sibella. “Well” you say. “C'mon,

lights out girls” said Shaggy opening the door enough to pop his head in. “Reah, rights out” added

Scooby. The girls look back to you for a response. “Sorry girls” you say smiling. “Guess I'll have to tell

you another time” you say shrugging your shoulders. “Aaaawwwww” all the girls say in unison. “Let's

go girls, let him get ready for bed” said Shaggy as the girls exited your room. Before he left Shaggy

turned back to you giving you a thumbs up as if saying “Your welcome”. “Heh heh” you chuckle

rubbing the back of your head as you return the thumbs up. As soon as he leaves and shuts the door

behind him you flop down onto your bed and let out a heavy sigh. “Am I some kind of idiot? How in

the world can I tell them THAT”! You say out loud to yourself.
132322221221212112211122111122121112111.title: Looking for Answers

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
'Well, tonight's the night' You thought to yourself as you woke up on Halloween morning. You put on a

pair of jogging pants and decide to forget the shirt and go downstairs to see everyone else already

awake. “Good morning sleepy head” said Phanty as she floated over to you, giving you a hug. As you

reach the bottom of the stairs Sibella and Winnie do the same, embracing you in a hug. “Good

morning” they both say. Morning girls, you say smiling sheepishly, while slightly blushing. You then

look over to see Elsa and Tannis carving pumpkins. “Morning Elsa, morning Tannis” you say waving to

them. “Good morning” they both say. You put your shoes on and begin walking out the door. “Where

are you going”? Asked Sibella. “I figured since you girls know about my martial arts skills now, there's

no reason for me to hide it anymore. I'm just going to get in a good work out before breakfast” you say.

“Can I watch”? Asked Winnie. “Me too”. “Me three” added Sibella and Phanty. 'Oh brother' you think.

“Sure, the more the merrier. Just try not to get in the way” you say politely. “We won't” the girls say in

unison as they follow you out the door. Elsa just shakes her head and rolls her eyes as she moves on to

spreading the cob webs. Tannis looks out the window to see the girls following right behind you.

“Wow, I didn't know the girls were so interested in martial karts” she said. “It's pronounced martial arts,

and they're not trust me. They're interested in something else entirely”. “What's that”? Asked Tannis.

“I'll tell you when you're older” Elsa replied. “I hate that excuse” said Tannis folding her arms. As you

find a nice, wide open area, you begin your stretches. The girls enjoy the view from the sidelines as you

reach down to stretch your legs. You hear the girls giggling amongst each other but decide to ignore

them, after all it's not causing any harm. “Aw man, that feels better” you say finishing your stretches.

“Time to get started”. You lay in a push up position, nothing out of the ordinary, but what the girls see

next shocks them. You proceed to doing your push ups with only your left thumb! You begin to count

off nonchalantly. “One, two, three, four.....” without any discomfort. “Y-your only using your thumb”!

Sibella exclaimed. You stop for a moment. You look to your thumb and back to them. “You're right”

you say. “I should add some weight”. All the girls face fault to the ground. They all quickly recover.

“Good grief” says Phanty. “Hey Winnie” you say. “Hm”? She asks. “Could you come sit on my back

please”? She obliges of course, quickly running over and jumping on your back and sitting Indian style.

“Thanks” you say. “Anything for you” she says sticking her tongue out at the other girls. Sibella and

Phanty give her pouty faces as they fold their arms. “Uh, okay, well hold on” you say as you continue

your push ups. About half an hour later Sibella and Phanty are watching in amazement and Winnie was

as well as she sat on your back. “497, 498, 499, 500” you say. “Thanks Winnie, you can hop off now”.

She hops down as you get up stretching your arms. “Oh yeah” you say. “That really got the blood

flowing”. “So your all done with your push ups”? Asked Phanty. “Yep” you reply. The girls sigh in

relief, thinking that they would finally get to see some martial arts. “Time for squats” you say. All the

girls face fault again. After you finish working out your arms, legs, and abs, you finally start the martial

arts portion of your daily routine. The girls look on with earnest as this is the moment they've been

waiting for. You show off for them for about ten or fifteen minutes, showing them a display of a wide

array of different strikes, kicks, knees, and elbows that were very pleasing to the eyes, letting them get

what they came for. You finish off the routine and are met with applause from the girls as they clearly

enjoyed your performance. You say “Thanks girls, but there's still one technique I have yet to show

you”. “Oh, show us please” said Winnie. “Yeah, pretty please” added Phanty. “Sure” you reply. “But

you girls may want to step back a little”. They take a few steps back as you walk up to a nearby tree.

There was nothing growing on it so you knew it was okay to do what you were about to do. You take a

solid stance as the girls watch, anxiously waiting to see the technique. You draw in a few deep breaths,

and then “FIST OF HEAVEN”! You shout and a loud CRACK is heard as you punch the tree and the

tree shatters and splinters all over the place, leaving nothing but a stump where the tree used to be. You

turn back to the girls and bow. They then give you a thunderous applause. “Holy Howlers that was

great”! Said Winnie. “I'll say” said Sibella. “It was spooktactular” added Phanty. “Welp” you say. “I'm

going to go back up to my room and meditate for a while” you girls should go help get ready for the

open house tonight. Your dad's are coming right”? You ask. “Yes, it's going to be fangtastic” said

Sibella. The four of you walk back to Grimwood and you walk upstairs to your room and the girls help

finish setting up the decorations. As the sun sets it gets dark and it's just about time for the open house

to begin. Knowing your own family isn't coming you sneak your way to the back door and walk out.

'Sorry girls' you think to yourself. 'But I think I am just going to sit this one out'. “Their dads made it

pretty clear they don't like me the last time we met anyway” you say to yourself. You decide to trek into

the woods and wait for the open house to be over. “Ah, this looks like a good spot” you say as you

reach an open area. You look up at the full moon. “The moon sure is beautiful” you say. “It sure is” a

voice replies. You jump back and take a fighting stance on reflex only to see that it is Whisper. “Woah,

take it easy, it's only me. I'm here like I said I would be” he says. You drop your stance. “Yeah, fine

then. Say what you have to say” you reply. “Right to the point huh, no 'Hi how have you been' or

anything”? He asks sarcastically. “Just stop with the formalities and get to the point” you say. “Alright

then” he says. “If you insist”. “Hiya”! He yells throwing a side kick at you. You just barely avoid it and

throw a spinning hook kick in return, which he blocks. “Ah, still as quick as ever” he says grabbing

your kicking leg and throwing you. You flip while still in the air and land on your feet. “And nimble I

see” he added. “What are you talking about”? You ask as you charge at him. You begin to throw a

flurry of punches and kicks “We've never fought before” you state matter of factly. Whisper is easily

avoiding all of your strikes and kicks. “That's where you'd be wrong my friend” he replies. He then

begins his own offensive. You are shocked at his strength and speed as he lands blow after blow. He

then throws a hard jab right at your chin sending you flying to the ground. Needless to say you are a

little shaken up. 'H-his moves, they look just like mine. They're identical'! You think. You quickly get

up, wiping the blood from your lip. “Alright then asshole, you asked for it” you say forming a fist. You

charge at him at full speed. “FIST OF HEAVEN”! You yell. A loud THOOM echos throughout the

woods and birds and animals run and scatter from the impact of your strike.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: Halloween and A Brawl

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
Back at Griimwood the

noise is heard as is echos through the school. “Like, what in the world was that”? Inquires Shaggy. The

girls and their fathers hear it as well. “I don't like the sound of that” said Dracula. “Wait a minute” said

Sibella. “Where is he”. Everyone looks around. Phanty floats up to your bedroom door and phases her

head through. She quickly pulls it back out. “He's not there” she said in a worried tone. “I don't like the

look of this” said Ms. Grimwood. Frankenstein pointed out the window at the flocking birds. “Look,

whatever it is, it's coming from over there. They immediately bust open the back door. Winnie takes a

deep whiff of the air. “Sniff sniff.....Gasp! It IS him. He's this way she said pointing in your direction.

Her and everyone else rush to your location. “I hope he's okay” said Tannis. “Don't worry dear, I'm sure

your little friend will be fine” said the Mummy. He had no idea how wrong he was. Back with you and

Whisper, what you saw, you almost couldn't comprehend. “Y-you blocked it”! You exclaimed. “T-

there's only one man in the world that knows the counter to the Fist of Heaven” you say staggering

back. You are literally trembling all over. Whisper walks into the moonlight. “I-it can't be” you say as

your eyes begin to tear up. “That's right” says Whisper. He reaches for and rips off his masks, finally

revealing his face. You fall to your knees in shock. “D-dad” you stutter. “Yes son, it's me” he says

walking over to you. “I'm sorry about the secrecy, but I couldn't risk letting those monsters discover my

identity”. You are completely speechless at this point. “The only reason I attacked you was to examine

how much your skills had progressed, and I am impressed. You've done well keeping up with your

training” he says smiling at you. You are still on your knees completely dumbfounded. “But that's not

the only reason I've come” he continues. “From the information I've gathered over the past few months,

these monsters are amassing some kind of army to wipe out the human race. As you know, being who I

am I can't allow that to happen. I've been gathering an army of my own to combat this threat, but there

was no one on par with me who could help me lead the troops” he said looking down at you. “And then

I remembered you. You were the only one I trained and instilled with the skills necessary for such a

task. Join me son” he says extending a hand to you. “Join me, so that we can end this destructive

conflict between the monsters and humanity. Join me, so that we may bring peace to the world”. You

look up at him and slowly grab his hand. He begins to lift you up when you suddenly punch him as

hard as you can right in the face. He falls to the ground with a THUD. “YOU BASTARD”! You yell at

him. “I thought you were DEAD”! He slowly gets up, brushing the dirt from his jacket. “I had no

choice. Once I got wind of what the monsters were planning I had to take the necessary precautions to

make sure they wouldn't try to come after me” he says as he looks deeply into your eyes, which are

streaming with tears. “Or anyone close to me” he finished. “Mom's married to that asshole and doesn't

give two shits about me anymore”! You continue to yell. “How can you possibly justify that”?! “I was

afraid and alone for so long. I had no one to turn to. You hear me? NO ONE”! You say. You are bawling

at this point and welling up with a wide array of different emotions. Your eyes are closed as you

continue to weep. You then open them in shock as you feel your father wrap his arms around you in a

hug. “I'm sorry son” he says as he begins to cry to. “You're right, there's no justifying what you've gone

through”. “I-I love you son”. You finally give in and hug him back with all your might. “Dad! I

thought I lost you” you say. “It's okay son, I'm here now, and I'm here to stay” he says reassuringly.

“Look son, as heart warming as this reunion is, we need to get our wits about us. There's no doubt those

monsters from the school heard that punch earlier. I'd bet anything they'll be here any minute”. “I need

to leave for now, before I'm discovered”. “But dad” you say. “I have so many questions about all this-”.

“Another time” he says interrupting you. He grabs his mask and puts it back on. “Don't worry son” he

says as you wipe the tears from your eyes. “I'll be in touch, and closer than you think” he says as he

runs off into the woods. After all that has just happened you take in a breath and let out a heavy sigh as

you flop onto the hard ground, completely exhausted. You stare up at the full moon for the next few

minutes. “Happy Halloween Dad” you say to yourself as you hear the pitter patter of many feet running

in your direction.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: Whisper's Identity

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
(At Revolta's Lair)

“This is absolutely perfect” said Revolta. “Now is the perfect time to grab the girls from Grimwood and

amass my army”. “Yes my queen, with the daughters of the most powerful ghouls in the monster world

under your control, no one could stop you” said the Grim Creeper. “Yes, this is so exciting, soon, I

Revolta, Queen of the Web, shall be the most feared ghoul in all the world”. “But what about the

humans at the school your majesty”? Asked Creeper. “They don't concern me” she replied brushing off

his question. “Once the girls are under my control, I'll simply have them kill the humans and be done

with it”. “Wow, you sure are smart my queen” said Creeper, sucking up to her. “But of course Creeper,

that's why I'm Queen” she stated arrogantly. Then with a wave of her wand she summoned her spider

bats. “Now go my spider bats, and bring the ghoul girls to me! MWAHAHAHA”! Her and Creeper

cackled maniacally as the spider bats flew out into the night.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: Revolta, Queen of the Web

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
“FATHER”! You yell at the top of your lungs as you realize your in your bed back at Grimwood. You

look down placing a hand on your head, remembering what transpired last night. You see that your in a

cold sweat and you have bandages all over your body. You go and open the curtains to see that the sun

is up. You then look up to see Phanty's head phased through the door. “Ugh, haven't you ever heard of

knocking”? You ask sarcastically. “What if I had been naked or something”? “That would be fine with

me” she said winking at you. You just roll your eyes as you go to sit on the bed. “He's up everybody”

She yells downstairs. You then hear what sounds like a stampede as the rest of the girls, Ms.

Grimwood, Shaggy, Scooby, and Scrappy all come in to see you. You are immediately bombarded with

a million question. You raise a hand to get everyone to be quiet. “Thank you for the concern but you

can relax everybody, I'm fine”. “Like, what in the world happened”? Asked Shaggy. “Just a scuffle with

some wierdo, luckily I scared him off” you say hoping they believe you. “Wow! He must have been

tough to be able to go toe to toe with you” said Sibella. “Yeah” you say looking out the window as the

sunlight pours in. “He was”. You hop out of bed and grab a towel. “Um, you guys mind getting out of

the way? I kind of smell like ass” you say. “Oh” they reply stepping aside as you walk out of the room

and down the hall to the bathroom. Everyone pokes their head out of the door to see you closing the

bathroom door behind you. “Well, he certainly seems like he's okay” said Ms. Grimwood as she

Shaggy, Scooby, and Scrappy went back downstairs to prepare for the schools activities for the day.

The girls look at each other with concern and back to the bathroom. “I sure hope so” said Winnie as the

girls dispersed to ready themselves for the day. All except for Phanty who had a mischievous grin on

her face as she waited for the other girls to head back to their respective rooms. Once the coast was

clear she casually floated over to the bathroom. Inside the bathroom you've already hopped in the

shower. Your hand is firmly planted on the tile wall in front of you as you look down at the floor of the

tub as the water poured down onto your head. You keep going over the events of last night through

your head, trying to make sense of what your father said. 'The monsters are amassing an army'? You

think. 'They haven't done anything even remotely suspicious looking since I got here'. 'I hope he

decides to show himself again soon'. “Sigh, this is all so confusing”. “I could clear things up for you”

you hear a voice from behind you in the tub. Acting solely on reflex you throw a punch stopping just

before it hit the person right in face once you realize who it is. “Phanty”! You exclaim. “Woah! That

was a little too close” she said nonchalantly as if there was nothing wrong with the situation. “What are

you doing?! I'M NAKED”! You yell. “That's why I'm here” she replied. “I just wanted to see IT before

anyone else” she says looking down at your package. “Nice to see your well equipped, that's good to

know” she said winking. You immediately yank the shower curtain to cover yourself. “Will you get

out”?! You shout. She floats above the shower, almost touching the ceiling. “Why? Things getting a

little too 'steamy' for you” she asks as she began laughing at the terrible pun. “Grrrrr.....GET OUT”!

You yell. “Oh fine, Mr. Party Pooper” she replied with a pouty face, phasing through the ceiling. You

breathe in heavily and let out a long sigh as you try to calm yourself and finish your shower'What am I

going to do with her' you think to yourself. But then you hear someone open the door. “Geepers, is

everything, like, okay in here”? Asked Shaggy. You pull back the curtain giving him the 'I will kill you

look'. “Zoinks! Like, sorry I asked”? He said shutting the door. After a little while you finish your

shower and hop out to dry yourself off. You look up at the ceiling and smile. 'Well, at least everyone's

in good spirits' you think to yourself.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: A Phantom in the Shower

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
With a towel wrapped around your waist, you walk out of the bathroom, down the hall, to your room.

You walk in, close the door and lock it behind you. You turn on the light and throw your towel on the

bed. You turn to face the window saying “Hopefully I can get through the rest of the day witho-” you

stop in mid sentence upon seeing Winnie standing by the window. That wasn't the only thing wrong

however. She was naked! “BWAH”! You yell in surprise. “Gasp, what in the world are you doing”? She

asked sarcastically. “What do you mean? This is MY room”! You exclaim. “What”? She asked as she

continued in her sarcastic tone. “I could have sworn this was my room”. “Yeah right” you say putting a

hand over your eyes as you stagger blindly over to the bed trying to get your towel. “Please just go

Winnie” you say as nicely as possible trying to control your temper. You grab you towel and quickly

wrap it around your waist. “What's the hurry”? She asked seductively as she walked over to you as you

still had a hand over your eyes. She grabs your hand pulling it away from your face. “I want you to

see” she whispers. You look down at her, seeing all her 'assets' you become flustered. “C-come on

Winnie. J-just leave” you say, your face beet red as you reach for the door. Winnie then wraps her

naked self around you. “G-GAH”! You yell as Winnie nuzzles her furry face into your masculine chest.

“W-W-Winnie! I've got training to do”! You say trying to come up with an excuse for yourself. Come

on” she said. “I'm naked. You're naked. I'm sure I could give you a hard workout” she said winking.

You stagger backward and trip onto your bed. “I-I think I'll pass” you say. “Oh really”? She asked,

hands on her hips. “You might be saying no, but your 'little friend' is saying other wise” she said

pointing down at your member. You look down to see it pitching a tent with your towel. 'Great,

betrayed by my own manhood' you think to yourself. Winnie takes this opportunity and pounces on top

you. She wraps her legs around your waist to prevent your escape. You begin to shake nervously with

anxiety. Winnie places both of her warm, comforting, furry hands on each side of your face. “Now

now” she said comfortingly. “This will be just as pleasurable for you as it is for me” she said. She then

closed her eyes and leaned in for a kiss while still holding your head in place. You then hear the

windows burst open as a purple bat flies in and grabs Winnie by the hair. You see that it's Sibella in bat

form. “GAH”! Yelled Winnie as Sibella pulled her back towards the window. “What the hell are you

doing you batty bitch”! Shouted Winnie. You hear a bunch of bat shrieks as Sibella pulls Winnie out the

window and back to her own room. She then flies back to your window to see if your okay. She sees

you lying flat on your bed, pale as a sheet. Your out cold with a slight nose bleed and a goofy looking

grin on your face. 'Oh brother' thought Sibella as she flew back to her own room.

“Girls....ghosts.....werewolves......bats....” You begin muttering to yourself in your semiconscious state.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: A Wolf in the Bed

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
After you regained your composure and got dressed for the day and headed downstairs. 'Good grief, I

like the girls and all, but they're really driving me batty'. You then stop and face palm yourself in the

forehead, realizing your inadvertent play on words. You reach the bottom of the stairs and exchange

salutations with everyone as you make your way out the door. Winnie and Phanty try to tag along.

“Look girls, I need a little 'me' time, so please don't follow me. It's nothing personal. I'm going out for

some training, I'll be back in a little while” you say, waving 'bye' to everyone. As you make your way

outside you think. 'Just to make sure I'm not followed'. You jump high into the air and begin jumping

from tree to tree as quickly as you can, almost instantly disappearing from the girl's sights. Both Phanty

and Winnie look disappointed. Then Phanty quickly looked around, realizing someone was missing.

“Um, where's Sibella”? She asked. Winnie's ears then perked up as she looked around frantically for

her. She was then hit with the realization. Her eyes narrowed as she said “Oh no she didn't”. You

continue to leap from tree to tree as you see a dense bog up ahead. 'That's perfect, they'll never think to

look for me in there you think as you jump down into the bog. You begin walking deeper into the bog

and find a quaint little spot to begin your training. “This looks like a good enough spot” you say.

Unbeknownst to you, there was a little purple bat perched upside down on the tree above you, watching

you with a cute little smirk. 'Finally, I've got him all to myself' she thought. She flew ahead of you to

transform without being noticed. As she does that you notice a few crocs is the swamp ahead and make

your way into it. The crocodiles take notice and make their way towards you. You see them

approaching and smirk. 'Just the kind of training I've been needing' you think. “Come on then, I could

use a new pair of boots and wallet”. The alpha male, about twice your size, rushes towards you mouth

open. You grab his upper and lower jaws before they snap on you. “Heh, this is fun. I should've done

this sooner” you say. The croc tries to overpower you to no avail. You throw it's head to the side and it

tries swinging it's tail at you. You however, grab it's tail and lift him up and begin slamming him from

side to side. Then to finish it off you spin him round and round, picking up momentum. You then

release him, sending it flying, headfirst into a tree with a loud CRASH and then SPLASH as it fell back

into the water. As it floated to the top, you saw it was dizzy and unconscious. “Man, that was a good

warm up” you say, You look back towards the other crocs smiling. “Who's next”? You ask excitedly.

They all immediately turn and swim away. “Aw man, that wasn't nearly as fun as I thought it would be”

you say disappointed as you walk out of the swamp. “I'll happily be next” you hear a sultry voice say.

You look to your left to see bikini clad Sibella standing there in a seductive pose. “Hi Sibella” you say

half heartedly. “Aw, what's with that tone”? She asks, walking over to you. “Well as you saw earlier

your not the only girl to try this today” you say. “Don't get me wrong, I do appreciate what you did,

Winnie was out of control”. “I agree” she said. “Which is why I'm here to show you how IN control I

can be” she said seductively as she rubbed her hands on your chest. “I really don't need this right now”

you say as you turn to walk away, only to see Sibella standing in front of you again. “GWAH”! You

yell as you trip and fall on your butt. This makes Sibella giggle. You stand back up. “Oh right, I forgot

vampires could do that” you say wiping the dirt from your pants. “Yes, it's just another one of our

predatory powers” she replied. “Really, does that make me your prey”? You ask jokingly. “Maybe” she

says wrapping her arms around your shoulders, holding you tight. “W-what are you doing”? You ask

nervously. “Just relax” she says in a very calming tone of voice. You can't help but look into her bright,

emerald green eyes, almost as if they were hypnotizing you. Sibella then begins embracing you. “Did

you know that we vampires also have an overwhelming power of seduction” she asked coyly as you

couldn't look away from her gaze. “I......didn't......know........that......” you say spacing out as you were

falling prey to Sibella's vampiric influence. “Kiss me” she said as she leaned in for one.

“Yes......mistress......” you say as you do the same. “SIBELLA”! You hear a familiar voice say as it

interrupts you. “Damn” said Sibella. “What rotten timing” she said looking at who it was that impeded

her. It was Phanty and Winnie. “Hey, that's cheating”! Yelled Phanty. “You can't use your powers like

that”. “I don't want to hear it Ms. 'I'm going to phase into the bathroom while he's showering'. Phanty

quickly looked away, embarrassed. “You're not even giving him a choice”! Said Winnie. “Says the girl

who had him pinned to the bed an hour ago”. She did have a good point. The three continued to argue

amongst one another for a good ten minutes. Then Sibella spoke up. “Hey, hold on a sec. Where is he”?

She asked. The girls looked around, only to see that you were long gone. You had made your way out

of the forest, rubbing your head. “This is getting far too ridiculous. I need a break” you say. You then

see the Calloway camp. “That's it” you say.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: A Bat in the Bog

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
You make your way to the Calloway camp without being noticed by anyone at Grimwood. You ring the

buzzer at the front gate. Calloway sees that it's you through the security camera. “Can I help you”? He

asked. “Yes please sir, the girls at Grimwood have been kind of running me ragged. I know this is the

one place I could go where they won't look for me” you reply. “”Well I suppose I cant turn away a boy

in need” said Calloway. You see the gates creak open and Calloway walks out and motions for you to

follow him. “So what's the matter son, trouble in paradise”? He asks. “You could say that” you reply as

you continue to follow him. “Three of the girls there really like me, and I don't mind that” you say.

“But they won't give me ANY kind of personal space”. “Ah girl troubles, that takes me back” he says.

“Don't worry yourself about it too much” he said putting a hand on your shoulder. “Young love is an

adventure” he says smiling at you. You and Calloway reach the boys barracksand he opens the door.

“ATTENTION”! He yells. All the boys quickly stand and salute him. “Listen up boys. This young man

is going to be staying with us for a bit. During his stay you are to treat him no different than you would

each other, and if I find out otherwise, there will be consequences. Is that understood”? He asked. “SIR,

YES SIR”! They all yell. “At ease” he said. “Thank you Colonel” you say. “No problem” he replies.

“Now you boys get along. I need to go call Ms. Grimwood and let her know you're here”. “Yes sir” you

reply. Once the Colonel was gone the boys began walking up to you. You immediately take a defensive

stance. “WOAH”! They say flinching. “Take it easy” said Tug. “We just wanted to apologize for what

happened last time we met”. “Oh, well I suppose we can put all that behind us” you say shaking each of

their hands. Actually, we've been wanting to ask you something” one of the boys said. “Oh”? You ask.

“Yeah” said Tug. “After we saw how good of a fighter you are, we were wondering if you could teach

us how to fight like that”. You look at each of them, seeing the sincerity in their faces. “Sorry to

disappoint you guys, but my teacher told me to never teach these skills to anyone else. They are

extremely dangerous, not only to the people around you, but to you yourself if performed incorrectly”.

You state, matter of factly. They all look very disappointed. You then get an idea. “Although” you say

grabbing their attention. “If you were to just so happen to see me training, and copy my movements, I

don't suppose I could stop you” you say winking at them. “Really, thanks” they say. “For what”? You

reply. “I have no idea what you're talking about”. You walk outside and the boys follow. You proceed to

train for the next hour or so as the boys watched from a distance and mimicked your movements. You

finish your training and wipe the sweat from your brow. “Hey come with us” they say motioning for

you to follow them. As you follow them you see a large watchtower. The boys begin climbing to the

top and you follow right behind them. You reach the top and see a pretty ritzy set up. One of the boys

goes to a fridge and offers you pizza. Your mouth is watering, considering you haven't had a slice of

NORMAL pizza since you started at Grimwood. From the watchtower you could see Grimwood, and

the girls out in front of the school, most likely waiting for you. Unbeknownst to you though, the girls

had agreed to quit bickering amongst one another. “So we all agree then” said Sibella. “Whomever he

chooses, that will be his decision right”? She asked. “Yep” said both Winnie and Phanty in unison. Elsa

and Tannis were also in the front yard playing when all five girls saw some black creatures approaching

from the sky. “Hey what the heck is that”? Asked Elsa pointing at the objects flying towards them. As

the objects flew closer they saw what they were. “Spiderbats”! Shrieked Tannis. The spiderbats quickly

swarmed the girls. From the watchtower at the Calloway camp you see the girls in a bit of a frenzy but

can't quite make out what's going on. “Hey Tug, hand me your binoculars”. He complies. What you see

shocks you. “Oh no! THE GIRLS”! You exclaim. You see the terrified looks on their faces as they are

enveloped by the spiderbats' webs. It is then that an anger wells up inside of you, the likes of which you

have never felt before. You drop the binoculars and jump from the watchtower. The boys watch in

amazement as you jump from tree to tree. You have a look of sheer hatred on your face as you make

your way back to Grimwood. By now the girls, along with Shaggy, Scooby, Scrappy, and Ms.

Grimwood are all trapped and encased in the spiderbats' webs. They are just about to grab the girls to

fly them back to Revolta's lair when everyone saw what looked like a dot in the sunlight, growing in

size. It quickly became an outline of a person. Then everyone heard a loud THOOM. Once the dust

cleared everyone saw you, but you didn't look like yourself. “You're here”! Said the girls. You didn't

respond. You look at the spiderbats as they screech at you. You merely continue to look at them with a

look of pure hate. Then you finally speak up. “I'll say this once. Leave now.....”you say taking a

fighting stance. “.....Or DIE”! You say in a deep tone of voice.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: Calloway Hospitality

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
Everyone at Grimwood looks on with desperation, hoping you can save them. You don't take your eyes

off the spiderbats. They screech at you in an attempt to intimidate you, but to no avail. You simply

stand there, stone faced. Two of the spiderbats them try to swoop down on you, trying to encase you in

their web, just as they did the others. You have other plans however. You grab both of them by their

squealing heads. They begin to flail about madly in a desperate attempt to get away. All you do is scowl

at their pathetic attempts. Then CRUSH! You clench your fists and crush their skulls and their lifeless

bodies flop on the ground. You then release your grip, letting the remnants of their heads fall to the

ground as well. Everyone looks at you in astonishment at your unexpected level of brutality. The other

eight bats then swarm you together, thinking it was their only chance for survival. You punch and kick

at them but they continue scratching at you, leaving fresh claw marks all over your body.

“GRRAAAHHH”! You yell, extending a hand, grabbing another one of the spiderbats. You raise it high

in the air and quickly slam it down to the ground, crushing it's body. Then you jump away from the

other bats for a moment to breath. In the vegetable patch not far from you, was a spying eye. A venus

spy trap to be exact. On the receiving end of the spy trap's video feed, was Revolta, watching your fight

with her spiderbats. “What in the world IS he”? She asked out loud. “Gee, I don't know my queen”

responded the Grim Creeper. “He can't be human, no human has THAT kind of strength” he finished.

“Well apparently THIS one does” said Revolta. She looked at you with increasing interest. “Hmmm,

that face....those features.....and that fighting style.....” she thought out loud. “What is it my queen”?

Asked Creeper. “It could just be coincidence” she said scratching her chin in thought. “Creeper, bring

me my monster survival guide”. “Why would you need that old thing your nastiness”? He asked. “Just

do it”! She exclaimed. “Yipes! Y-yes my queen”. He rushed over to the book shelf, grabbed the book,

and brought it over to her. She proceeded to yank it from him and began flipping earnestly through the

pages. “Let's see, 'S', 'T', “U', Ah! Here it is” she said holding the book up to the screen. “I don't believe

it”! She said, shocked. “The likeness is uncanny”. In the book she was holding, under the V's was a

picture of your father. Above the picture it read “Monster Hunter, Van Helsing” and below the picture,

in big bold letters, it read “AVOID AT ALL COSTS!”. “I thought he looked familiar” she said. “Yes, he

must be the offspring of Van Helsing. This changes everything”! She exclaimed. “Why your

maliciousness”? Asked Creeper. “Think about it Creeper” she replied. “With him under my control, my

army will be unstoppable”. “B-but you tried to do the same thing to Van Helsing years ago and it didn't

work” Creeper rebuttaled. “Yes, but you know what they say, if you can't seize the hawk, then go for

the hatchling” she said with an evil smirk. “But even so, he IS only human, AND the son of the

notorious monster hunter Van Helsing, no one in your army would listen to him”. “You just let me

worry about that Creeper, you call off the spiderbats” she replied. “Yes your highness” he said bowing.

“Yeeessss” she said hissing. “He's perfect. MWAHAHAHA”! She cackled as the screen focused in on

your face. Back at Grimwood, you had been successfully fending off the attack of the spiderbats. Then

suddenly, they stopped attacking. The remaining spiderbats quickly flew off, retreating from the fight.

Your look of hatred and malice was replaced with a smile, thinking you were victorious. Then you fall

to a knee, as the adrenaline from the fight wears off. You are riddled with scratches. You walk over to

everyone to help them. “Are you guys okay”? You ask. “Yeah, thanks to you” said Elsa. “That's good”

you say as you walk over to Shaggy. You pull out a little switch blade the Calloway boys gave you as a

memento of your stay with them. You smile down at Shaggy. “Nice sleeping bag” you say. “Heh heh,

yeah, but like, it's a little too snug for my tastes” he replies. “I can fix that” you reply. You hold the

blade to the webs. “Hold perfectly still” you say. You then slice open the web, freeing Shaggy of his

confines. Then you do the same for everyone else. All the girls rush to you, embracing you in a very

tight hug. “Oh Thank you, thank you, thank you” said Phanty. “Yes, that was very brave” added

Sibella. “You were great”! Exclaimed Winnie. “Ack! Too tight! Too tight”! You wheeze as you gasp for

breath. “Oh! Sorry” they say blushing as they release you from their grip. “It's no problem” you say

rubbing the back of your head. “I'm just glad you girls are o-” you stop mid sentence to see that your

vision is going blurry and you are staggering. Next thing you know you black out and fall to the ground

with a loud THUD. “Oh no! Quickly, get him inside” is the last thing you hear before you're out cold.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: Spider Extermination and A New Evil Plot

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
Your eyes flutter open and everything comes into focus as you regain consciousness. You prop

yourself up in your bed and see that all your wounds had been treated. You turn your head to see Sibella

asleep at your desk. Then you look to the foot of your bed to see Winnie curled up, asleep as well. You

then look up to see Phanty asleep, floating above your bed. 'They must have been up all night watching

over me' you think to yourself. You remove your blankets and get up. The squeaky floorboards are

enough to arouse the girls from their slumber. “Oh good, you're finally awake” said Sibella, rubbing her

eyes. “YAWN” says Winnie as she shakes like a dog trying to dry itself off, in order to fluff out her fur.

“How are you feeling”? She asks. “Good” you reply. “That's a relief” said Phanty as she floated down

onto your bed, sitting beside you. “Yes, thanks to the tender love and care of you girls” you say. They

all blush at your comment. You then motion for them to come close and you embrace them in a group

hug. “I'm just glad to see you girls are okay” you say. “If anything happened to you girls, I don't know

what I would do”. The four of you walk downstairs and are greeted by Shaggy, Scooby, Scrappy, and

Ms. Grimwood. You exchange pleasantries with everyone and continue to the common room. There

you see Elsa and Tannis. You begin walking over to them to say hello, but Tannis steps away from you

in fear. “Huh”? You ask. “What's wrong with her”? “You, that's what's wrong with her” said Elsa in

Tannis' defense. “What are you talking about”? You ask, confused. “You were a totally different person

out there yesterday” she said. “You showed a side of yourself we didn't even know you had”. “Hey”!

Said Winnie, speaking up. “He saved us, or did you forget that little detail”. “Yes, I”m not denying that,

but what you did was unacceptable” she said picking up Tannis. “You were totally out of line and

scared Tannis half to death with that sadistic looking mug of yours”. You look over to Tannis. “Tannis,

I-I'm so sorry” you say trying to reach over to her. She just nuzzles herself further into Elsa and Elsa

slaps your hand away. “Don't you think you've done enough” she says. You merely drop your head in

defeat and turn away. You begin walking away. “Hey! You can't talk to him like tha-” “Stop Phanty”

you say interrupting her. Then Sibella speaks up. “But what abou-”. “Just....stop” you say again. “Elsa's

right”. You walk out the door into the front yard.. You had never looked so depressed. You turn and

face everyone as they follow you outside. “No one follow me, and I MEAN IT” you say sternly. You

immediately jump from tree to tree and are soon out of sight. The three girls look out onto the horizon

with looks of concern, hoping that you would be alright.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: Depression

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
You make your way farther into the dark forest than you have ever been before. You decide to jump

down from the tree tops and begin walking. As you walk you look down at the palms of your hands and

think, 'Who's REALLY the monster'? BOOM you hear as it begins to rain heavily. “Sigh, great” you

say as you continue walking, sulking over what had transpired at the school. You make you way to a

small pond and sit at the water's edge. You begin watching the rippling effect the rain is having on the

water's surface. You then look down at the distorted reflection of yourself in the water. “I should've

known this would happen. It happens every time I unleash my power” you say as you look into the

palms of your hands again. “Every time I show my power, people shun and reject me”. You then pause

briefly as you clench your fists and grit your teeth. “This power of mine is nothing but a curse”! You

exclaim as you well up with tears and punch the ground, causing the area around you to shake. “That's

where you're wrong” said a voice from behind you. Your eyes shoot open as you immediately jump up,

throwing a spin kick in the direction of the voice. Your foot stops inches away from the persons face, as

you see it's nothing more than an old green hag of a witch. “Whoa! Take it easy” she said holding her

four arms up in surrender. “I just heard a commotion and was wondering what it was”. “How long were

you spying on me” you reply, lowering your foot. “Spying”? She asks. “No, No, I wasn't spying. I was

just watching you” she says. “How long”? You ask, making sure she answered you. “Since you were by

the lake” she replies. “So you saw my power and you still snuck up behind me? Are you brave or just

stupid”? You ask. “Your power intrigues me” she said, ignoring your insult. “Y-you mean...you're not

scared”? You ask. “Of course not dear” she said, putting her four arms on your shoulders in a

comforting manner. “The power you have is special, and should be treated as such” she said in a fake

sympathetic tone. “Y-you think so” you ask, wiping away your tears. “Of course dear” she says

reassuringly. “Let's go in the house before we both catch a cold. I have a proposition for you” she says

as you both walk into the secret entrance of her castle. “Just who are you”? You ask curiously as you

both make your way inside. “I am Revolta” she said in a sincere tone. “I'm a friend” she said with the

fakest of smiles.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: The Green Witch

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: Proposition

1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.content:
You wake up in a daze. You're very confused as you look up and see the dark night sky. You try to

move, only to see that you are tightly strapped down to a table. “Oh you're finally awake” said a voice.

You look over to see it was Revolta. “What are you doing”!? You ask frantically. “Let me go”! You

demand. “Oh, well I'm afraid I can't do that” she replied. “I have BIG plans for you”. You take a deep

breath, calming yourself. “And what would that be”? You ask. “It's very simple” she replied. “I'm going

to give you what you want” she said. This confused you. You ask “What do you mean”? “Acceptance”

she says. “Acceptance dear boy, the love, understanding and acceptance of your precious Grimwood

girls”. She was right. That is what you wanted most you thought, as images of what had transpired the

day before began rushing through your head. “They fear you, you know”. “They just don't understand”

she continued. You turned away and frowned. “But don't worry my dear, I have the perfect treatment

for you that will make you closer to them than you ever were before” said Revolta. “A-and what

treatment is that”? You ask hesitantly. “I'm glad you asked. This treatment will transform you! Make

you more like them. Make you more like the girls you've grown to love so much. It will make you

more compatible with them and give them a greater understanding of you and your power” she

explained. “R-really”?! You ask, slightly excited at the prospect of the idea. “But....Why am I strapped

to a table”? You ask. “Trust me dear, the procedure is painful. I can't have you squirming around. That's

also why we're outside. I can't have you trashing my castle”. Her story seemed to make perfect sense to

you. “Well my dear, what do you say”? Revolta asked. Do you want the treatment? Do you want the

love and affection of the girls you love so much? Do you want acceptance and understanding”? She

asked, as if she were giving you a choice. You think for a long hard moment, having flashbacks of all

the fun times you had with the girls. 'She right' you thought to yourself. 'As nothing but a human, I

could never hope to gain their acceptance. Perhaps this treatment is the answer I've been looking for'.

“Alright Revolta, let;'s do it”! You say, nodding to give her the go ahead. “Excellent choice dear” she

said. “Creeper! Bring me the vials” Creeper immediately brought over three vials with different liquids

in them. One red, one glowing blue, and one a clearish green. “The procedure is simple, just swallow

what's in these three vials and you will be transformed into a being way more compatible with your

ghoul girls than your human self could ever be”. “That's it? Then let's hurry up and do this” you say as

you continue to think about how much you've grown to love the girls. “Very well” said Revolta. “But

be warned, this will be the most excruciating pain you've ever felt in your life” she said. “I'm willing to

take that pain. Let's do it” you say. “Alright then” she nods. “First” she says raising the red vial over

your open mouth. “The Vampires blood” she said pouring it into your mouth. You hesitantly gulp down

the thick liquid, thinking of how much better things will be afterward. You drink it all and she moves

on to the next vial. “Next” she says raising the clearish green vial over your mouth. “The werewolves

venom” she says pouring down your throat. You swallow it all down as quickly as possible, even

though it stung your throat. “And finally” Revolta stated, holding the glowing blue vile over your

mouth. “The Ghostly Ectoplasm” she said pouring the liquid in your mouth. You gulp it down,

anxiously awaiting for the procedure to be over. “It is done” she said. “Huh? What are you talking

about”? You ask. “I don't feel any di-UGH”! You say as a searing pain jolts through your entire body.

“AAAAAAAAHHHHHH”!!! You scream at the top of your lungs as your body convulses and your

eyes roll into the back of your head. Minutes pass and you continue to shake and scream in agony. Your

hair is the first to change. It's becoming a pale white and your eyes begin to turn black as your irises

change to a bright green. Hair begins to cover every part of your body, excluding your head, chest, abs,

hands, and feet. Revolta looks on with great pleasure as you begin to grow a set of fangs and the hair

on your head grows down past your shoulders. You continue to scream as a green aura envelops you

and you feel a large and wide array of power begin to seep into every fiber of your being. It was the

most exhilarating and painful thing you had ever experienced. But then through your new found

strength, you broke the bonds that held you and you stood, clasping your hands to the side of your head

in pain as you began to grow pointy ears, just like Winnie's. Then, in one final, deafening loud BOOM!

The transformation was complete. Revolta and Creeper looked on, from behind the safety of a large

rock. Once the smoke and dust cleared they saw you. White, flowing hair. Green, glowing eyes.

Clawed hands, and fanged teeth. Revolta walked out from behind the rock. “The transformation is

complete. “You are now part werewolf, part ghost, and part vampire. You are the first Ghoul Hybrid”!

She exclaimed. “How do you feel”? She asked. You take a moment to look at all your new features and

look into the palms of your hands as you feel the new found power within you. “I feel.....I feel.....I

FEEL GREAT”! You exclaim as you raise your fists to the sky, and the green aura envelops you again

and green lightning crackles in the sky. “That's wonderful” says Revolta. “Because now, you are under

my control” she says snapping her fingers.
1323222212212121122111221111221211121111.title: The Transformation

"Great, wanna come down stairs for dinner?" She asks you, and your stomach loudly growls. You had been so terrified since you had gotten here, you forgot all about food. It had been a while since you'd eaten, but you're not sure you want to see what monsters eat.

What are you going to do?
1323222212222.title: Tanis

choices: Try it, not to hurt Tanis' feelings
13232222122221.content:
Your hunger beats your fear, and you follow tanis down the crickty old stairs to the kitchen, which was a as dark and depressing as everything else in this house. The girl ghouls are all there, chatting amongst themselves, they stop for a moment when you enter, and you're feeling fear building up again. You now notice another human, and a large Great Dane sitting at the table.

Miss Grimwood entered the room behind you. "Ah, allow me to introduce you to your gym teachers Shaggy and Scooby." She says as she motioned towards the scruffy looking guy in the green shirt and his dog.

"Like, hey, you're the guy I accidentally hit with the door. Sorry about that." Shaggy says looking quite sorry. Scooby nodded.

"Rah, rorry."

You nod, not really concerned, just happy to see another human face. You're tempted to tell them to run now while the had the chance, but strangely they seemed calm.

Miss Grimwood placed the dinner on the table, some sort of horrible smelling meat, that nearly made you heeve. Shaggy noticed this and whispered to you.

"Don't worry man, I stocked up on real food before I came. I wasn't going to make the same mistakes I did last year."

Tanis looked to see you weren't eating. "Don't you want some? I made it myself." She said, pointing to the foul meat.

"Uhhhh..."
13232222122221.title: Go to dinner

You know the meat smells pretty horrible and not sure where it came from, but you know it would be very disrespectful of not trying Tanis' food. If you refused, it could come back to haunt you, literally. Besides, maybe it might not taste that bad and will not fill you. Then again, you hope if something goes wrong, someone knows first aid for food poisoning...

So you go ahead and take a bite out of the meat. How does it taste?
132322221222211.title: Try it, not to hurt Tanis' feelings

1323222212222111.title: Actually it tastes pretty good!

1323222212222112.content:
You need to do your best to not spit it out on the table. You have taste a lot of terrible things in your life but not one thing tasted so terrible as this. Even the cat food you tried when you were five tasted better then this. It seemed like the animal already died long ago. You're able too swallow it without throwing up.

"How do you like it? It's rotten crocodile meat. I got it from my mummy!"

"You don't say. Thanks Tannis but i don't really like rotten crocodile meat."

"Oh well. Shoot yourself." Tannis said and took a big bite of the meat and it seemed she really liked it.

"Strange tastes they have here."

"A bit but they're all right. You can have some of our food." A little dog said.

He seemed a lot like the big dog, but he was a lot smaller. Maybe they were related.
The food the human and the dogs ate seemed pretty normal so you're glad you can take some of their food.
Tannis looked at your plate and let out a small giggle.

"So you don't like our food but you eat that?" Tannis asked. "That food is fresh."

"Well you may not like fresh food i don't like rotten food."

All the girls you see eat rotten food and they all seemed to like it. These girls were a bit strange especially what kind of food they liked but they seemed to act nice. None of them tried to bite your throat through or suck your blood or strangle you.
Besides this gym teacher and those two dogs seem pretty normal. They eat normal food and were pretty calm around the girls so they could't be that scary.

"We were afraid you would't show up for dinner." Sibella said.

You must admit that Sibella looked very pretty.

"Yeah you seemed pretty freaked out." Winnie said.

"Ha ha haa. We did't scare you too much right?"

"Is she always that happy?" You ask Tannis whispering.

"Well we don't know if it's happiness. She's always laughing. Maybe she has a laugh tic. You get pretty fast used to it."

"I hope you feel at home here soon." Sibella said.

"Yeah maybe you could help us win the volleyball cup again! I still have pretty much room left in my mummy case!" Tannis said.

"Volleyball?" You ask.

"Yeah each year we play volleyball against the other school. Those Calloway cadet's." Winnie said.

"They won every year. Each time." Tannis said with sad eyes.

"Until we got our new gym teachers! Ha ha haa!" Fanty said laughing.

That kid really had a laugh tic or else a wacky sense of humor. But it felt pretty nice again to hear someone laughing. That did't happen much since your mother married your step father.
You take a look at the gym teacher. He did't seemed that much of a sport person but who knew. Never judge someone at their looks. The young pup at least seemed in pretty good shape.

Suddenly you realize you need to play against the Calloway cadet's. That's the school you were suppose too go. Instead your at these school. However ghouls or not he already started to like those girls. They were pretty nice.
You decide too act just like on a normal school against normal girls. Maybe this turned out all right.
1323222212222112.title: Dinner

choices: It was good i liked it
132322221222212.content:
I'm sorry Tannis, but i need real food. She looked at you sadly with her blue eyes almost as if she was going to cry, but then she said " its ok, I understand".

You were relieved that you didn't offend her. Shaggy then hands you some real food "Here you go". At that moment you have never been happier. On your plate is a normal steak that is well seasoned along with mashed potatoes and some soda. You are grateful and thank him before chowing down.

You must have been hungrier than you thought, you had emptied the entire plate in seconds. You would have asked Shaggy for more food but you looked over and saw a massive tower of plates in front of him and Scooby.

Your stomach growls and you look at the plate Tannis had left for you. It smells repugnant and grotesque but you are so hungry it does't matter. Plus you are worried that even though she said it was ok you may have hurt her feelings. You pull the plate over and grab a fork (you can see in your periphery vision that tannis is watching you). You dig into the plate and realize how awful it tastes, but once you get past the rotten meat taste its really not that bad. You end up licking your plate clean.

Tannis takes your empty plate and asks how it was. You reply....

15.content:
"Say hello to your youngest class mate, Tanis." Miss Grimwood said while motioning her hand towards a small girl who had just entered the room. The girl was wrapped head to toe in white bandages, except for her eyes, like a mummy from classic films. She also wore a pink bow on here head. Strange, it wasn't halloween, why was she dressed like that?

But, she was young, and if you're were going to be spending the rest of the year here you might as well be polite. "Hello Tanis, I love you're outfit."

The young girl smiled and looked at you for a moment. "Thanks you, my mummy made it for me."

Cute kid. Maybe you got all wrong, maybe this was just some sort of game they were playing. Perhaps they were pranking the new student? That had to be it, he just had to play along. "Great place you have here Miss Grimwood, I'm sure I'll feel right at home."

"Good, good, now would you like to be shown to your room?" The woman asked.

But Tanis began tugging on your shirt. "Wait, let me introduce you to the others first, everyone is so excited we're getting a someone strange like you."

You, strange? Oh well, this all has to be a game of some kind.

You decide to go check out your room you are going upstairs
and you hear some strange voices you are wondering what it could be

"Sure." You say to Tanis, putting your bags down to take up the stairs later. "Just lead the way." She takes your hand and leads you down the hall. Frankly, joke or not, this place looks like it should be condemned. That, and someone should really get rid of all the cobwebs.

You're finally led into the main room were a group of 3 girls stood chatting, but paused and looked in your direction.

One, with purplish skin, and long hair appeared to be a vampire. The other, with long wild hair and stitches all over her body looked a lot like Frankenstein. The third was shorter than the others was covered with fur like a werewolf.

Yep these were some costumes, pretty real looking.

"Where's Phantasma?"

153.content:
"Now who could that be?" Miss Grimwood opens the door just as a flash of lightening accompanies a loud clap of thunder.
"I'm sorry I'm late miss, I don't like flying in this weather." a pale girl with long blue hair and glowing green eyes steps in from pouring rain.
"Kari!" the other girls rush into the room and the new girl, Kari, gives a big hug to the pale girl with dark purple hair.
"Ah Kari, your uncle Dracula said you'd be joining us this semester." Miss Grimwood hugs her and motions brightly to a candle lit dining room. I look around, 'just a little creepy' i think to myself.
"Okay girls. This is an exciting day." Miss Grimwood sits in the high backed chair and a green dragon hops up into her lap. "This is Kari, Sibella's cousin. She's going to be helping Professor Shaggy take care of you. And this is..." A loud clap of thunder sounds and a large great Dane runs in and hides under the table.
"Scooby!" Tanis giggles and everyone laughs.
"Like Miss Grimwood, Matches and I made some cookies and milk before bed." a man with shaggy blond hair and a beard walks in with two trays piled with cookies.
"Wonderful, Shaggy. This is the new student." She gestures to me and Shaggy shakes my hand, "And this is Kari, Sibella's cousin, she's here to help you with the kids. Shaggy gets big hearts in his eyes and shakes here hand,
"Like wow man." Kari smiles and places a kiss on his cheek.
"Lovely to meet you Shaggy. Sibella and Uncle Dracula have told me so much about you." her voice is like a velvet wind blowing around them all.
153.title: There's a knock at the door, looks like som...

1533.content:
"So like, you're a vampire?" Shaggy asks as the Great Dane, Scooby, climbs out from under the table. Scooby stands on his hind legs and shakes Kari's hand; she laughs.
"Well of course." She grabs a cookie and takes a small bite. I gasp loudly and fall backwards in my chair. The younger girls giggle as Shaggy and Kari come around the table to help me up.
"Like jinkies man. Are you all right?"
"Here," Kari holds her hand out to me, i back up to the wall.
"You got fangs!" She lets her hand fall and her face falls with it.
"Well I've just come of age. they aren't all that intimadating yet." I hear the hurt in her voice but can't seem to apologize. Shaggy puts a quick arm around her shoulders and smiles,
"I think they are big enough. You can't blame a normal kid for reacting to fangs badly." Shaggy gets Kari to smile and she slides out from under his arm.
"I'm sorry Miss Kari, I've never seen them so big before." 'Truth was i hadn't seen any fangs my entire life, weren't these things fairy tales?'
Kari laughs, "It's only a fairy tale if you don't believe. But that won't make creatures of the night go away." A shiver passes through everyone in the room but everyone else seems to ignore it.
The girls finish their cookies and milk. They hug the teachers and head up to bed. "Oh dear, we will have to put you up in Shaggy's room, can't let you with the girls." Miss Grimwood smiles, not knowing that you couldn't pay me to be in a room full of girls; normal or not. Kari chuckles but shakes her head when Shaggy gives her a puzzled look; 'she can read my mind.' I think and she gives me a slight nod.
A sudden wind blows through the room, blowing the candles out and making the room dark. 'was that fear i just saw on Kari's face?'
1533.title: Are those fangs?!

info.brief_description: Due to a mix up you're going to Miss Grimwood's School for Ghouls. Scooby Doo based.
info.description:
Based on the movie Scooby Doo and the Ghoul School

You haven't been getting along with your mom, and your step dad is an idiot. So they decided to ship you off to Calloway's Military school just to get rid of you. But, due to a mix up in the mail, Miss Grimwood's School for Ghouls received the application. And Miss Grimwood is delighted to accept the first application ever from a human student.

So you're going to Ghoul School. Will you survive? Will you enjoy yourself?

Here are your classmates:

Sibella: Daughter of Dracula, able to transform into a bat.

Phantasma: Daughter of the Phantom. Has a strange sense of humor.

Elsa Frankensteen: Daughter of Frankenstein. Stitched together like her dad.

Winnie: Daughter of the Wolfman. Energetic, and constantly howling.

Tanis: The youngest. Daughter of the Mummy.

Your Teachers:

Miss Grimwood: The headmistress of the school. Looks forward to the first human student and what it will do for human/monster relations.

Shaggy: The only other human at the school. Nice, but flakey, always hungry, more cowardly then you.

Scooby Doo: Shaggy's dog, also cowardly and always hungry. Able to talk.

Scrappy Doo: Scooby's nephew, a little annoying, but at least he's brave.

Others:

Matches: The pet dragon of Miss Grimwood. Bad temper and fire breather = bad combo.

Mystery Inc: The group Shaggy, Scooby and Scrappy are members of. Mystery solvers, might be stopping by to visit at some point: Velma, Daphne, Fred.

Vincent Van Ghoul: Human warlock, friend of Mystery Inc, could show up in the story.

Calloway's School: Where you were suppose to go. At least there will be humans near by.

Villains:

Revolta: Witch of the Web, tried to take over the school last year. Might be hanging around still. Watch out.

The Military: Seems the military might have taken interest in the Ghouls. Be careful if you see black vans around.

Unknown:

Whisper: Black trenchcoat wearing human, seems to have some interest in you, hard to say if he's a friend or foe.

Rules:

1. No one liner chapters, please.
2. Keep swearing to a minimum.
3. If you intend to post something with a rating higher than 13+, post it in the chapter title to give warning.
4. The main character will remain nameless, unless I change my mind. Please remember that.

Remember, this is a work in process, adding is always welcome.
